SubText.Crewmate: 正义之光，<color=#ff1919>普照大地，发扬极盛！</color>
SubText.Impostor: 血溅千里，终无人生还，自取灭亡
SubText.Neutral: 自扫门前雪，鹏程万里成大业
SubText.Madmate: 退无可退，弃明投暗...<color=#ff1919>乃人之常情也</color>
SubText.LovingCrewmate: 君{0}，若星辰，每每让余驻足留恋
SubText.LovingImpostor: 谁言内鬼冷酷无情？<#ff1919>现终苦得一片芳心</color>，便与君{0}誓死不离
CrewmateSub: 找到邪恶势力，<color=#ff1919>逐出飞船！</color>
MadmateSub: 为自己的信仰，<color=#ff1919>前仆后继！</color>
UnsupportedMap: EHR无法做到自适应此地图\n我们可能无法保障你的游戏体验！
CTA.KnowRoles: 自定义团队里的众人知根知底
CTA.WinWithOriginalTeam: 众人可以随其原始阵营的获胜而获胜
CTA.KillEachOther: 自定义团队里的人可以内斗
CTA.GuessEachOther: 自定义团队里的人可以互压筹码
CTA.Arrows: 自定义团队里的人有指向彼此的箭头
EngineerEHRInfo: 敌明我暗，<color=#ff1919>邪恶无处遁形</color>
ScientistEHRInfo: 随时使用生命仪器，生死拿捏于股掌
ShapeshifterEHRInfo: 改头换面,真相...扑朔迷离
GuardianAngelEHRInfo: 快一点!再快一点! <color=#ff1919>生命安全容不得玩笑!</color>
ImpostorEHRInfo: 做好本职工作：击杀&破坏
NoisemakerEHRInfo: 即使我死，也不能死不瞑目!
TrackerEHRInfo: 你自以为天衣无缝...在我看来漏洞百出
PhantomEHRInfo: 隐匿于无形，不留半点蛛丝马迹
BountyHunterInfo: 为了金钱，项上人头，何足挂齿？
MareInfo: 黑暗是我的主场，恐惧是我的能量，尽情感受黑暗的力量吧！
FireWorksInfo: 看那烟花，皮绽肉开，美不胜收！不愧是我毕生的杰作！
SerialKillerInfo: 鲜血是我强劲的动力，无上的实力才能让你们臣服于我！
VampireInfo: 抽离魂体，让你不知不觉的死去！
WarlockInfo: 利用人性，千里之外，取敌首级！
AssassinInfo: Mark a target, then shift to kill them
HackerInfo: Force a player to report a body
MinerInfo: 地道战才是最先进的隐蔽方式！
MinimalismInfo: 杀人，用最朴素的手段，才能发挥出最大的效力！
EscapeeInfo: 我走上幕前，又退居幕后...可谁能知道这一切呢？
WitchInfo: 我能让你的死...神不知鬼不觉
MafiaInfo: 真正的主角，都是压轴出场！
GodfatherInfo: 我是你们的主！是你们至高无上的王！
PuppeteerInfo: 一堆人偶，一堆线，一根线断了...少一人。
TimeThiefInfo: 光阴似箭，日月如梭，都是我的功劳！
SniperInfo: 刀？这也太过时了，现在是热兵器时代！
EvilTrackerInfo: 让我走近你的背后...咔！让你人头落地！
SansInfo: Your cooldown decreases with each kill you make
BoobyTrapInfo: 一到十，十到百，就算我死了，船员也提心吊胆！
ScavengerInfo: 哦，真对不起，你现在..连死都没人知道了...
GangsterInfo: 这世间最好的方法莫过于动摇根基，瓦解内部！
CleanerInfo: 抱歉，我可没让你们报告...
ImperiusCurseInfo: 斗转星移，天道轮回，安危不定！
QuickShooterInfo: 这一次的放弃，是为了下一次而做的积蓄！
CamouflagerInfo: 谁是谁？谁杀了谁？你们一辈子...都猜不透！
EraserInfo: 我觉得你不配享受这场表演！
HangmanInfo: 在我面前，你还觉得你躲得掉吗？
SwooperInfo: 隐匿于无形，不留半点蛛丝马迹
CrewpostorInfo: 我只是履行一个身为船员的职责...对吧？
WildlingInfo: 看见了吗？连老天爷都在帮我！
TricksterInfo: 杀人诛心，你们永远等不到那片曙光！！
VindicatorInfo: 聚拢人心，让我的力量锦上添花！
ParasiteInfo: 我愿与内鬼肝胆相照，荣辱与共！
InhibitorInfo: 我至少尚存良知，不会趁火打劫，趁人之危
SaboteurInfo: 兵荒马乱，便是我出动之时
CouncillorInfo: 和你一起参与这场会议的..是活人..还是死人？
DazzlerInfo: 我会将你的眼球...渐渐层层剥离，直到你什么都看不见。
DeathpactInfo: 看！耶路撒冷的钟声已然敲响！
DevourerInfo: 美丽的皮囊，只能属于我...
MorphlingInfo: 我的目的无非就是...替代你。
LurkerInfo: 刀也需要同身手一样敏捷才对！
ConvictInfo: 你的目标已不在人世，弃明投暗吧！
VisionaryInfo: 你是哪方的人，我自有定数...
RefugeeInfo: 我愿与内鬼肝胆相照，荣辱与共！
UnderdogInfo: 弱者非弱，强者非强，重在作为，而非能力。
LuckeyInfo: 我对天虔诚，天意便会眷顾于我！
CyberStarInfo: 所有人都在关注着你的实时动态，包括你的死。
DemolitionistInfo: 就让你在生命的最后一刻体验杀人的快感吧！
TaskManagerInfo: 让我看看，你们有没有做好自己的本职工作！
NiceEraserInfo: 恕我直言，你这种恶人 <color=#ff1919>不配拥有能力！</color>
MayorInfo: 现在，我颁布一下逐出令...
PsychicInfo: 真真假假<color=#ff1919>假假真真</color>，成败在此一举
SabotageMasterInfo: 机械效能达不到100%，修理效能可以！
SheriffInfo: 揪出 <color=#ff1919>内鬼</color> & <color=#ffab1b>带刀中立</color>，送他们一击毙命！
CopyCatInfo: Ctrl C & V！我便是一切的起源！
SnitchInfo: 做好本职工作，<color=#ff1919>收获意外之喜</color>
SpeedBoosterInfo: 乘风而去，长空万里，直下看山河...
DoctorInfo: 只要鉴定死亡方式，一切自会水落石出！
DetectiveInfo: 按照现场情况，心自知哇一直摸你肚子！
UndercoverInfo: 打入敌方内部，必然会看出破绽，人心惶惶，不攻自破
SwordsManInfo: 今日重出江湖，行侠仗义！
TransporterInfo: Do tasks to swap 2 players' locations
TimeManagerInfo: Increase meeting time by doing tasks
VeteranInfo: Alert to kill anyone who interacts with you
GrenadierInfo: 恕我直言，<color=#ff1919>邪恶</color>不配拥有他那污浊的眼球！
LighterInfo: Catch killers with your enhanced vision
MedicInfo: Cast a shield onto a player
MorticianInfo: Report a body to know who interacted with them last
MonarchInfo: Give your crew extra voting power!
RetributionistInfo: Help the crew after you die
DeputyInfo: Handcuff killers to increase their cooldowns
GuardianInfo: Complete your tasks to become immortal
AddictInfo: Vent to become invulnerable, or you'll die
OracleInfo: Vote a player to see their alignment
SpiritualistInfo: You see where a ghost is
ChameleonInfo: Vent to disguise into your surroundings
ParityCopInfo: Validate the alignments of two players
InnocentInfo: Get someone ejected by making them kill you
RevolutionistInfo: Recruit players to win with you
WorkaholicInfo: Finish all tasks to solo win!
BloodKnightInfo: Killing gives you a temporary shield
TotocalcioInfo: Follow a player and help them
HexMasterInfo: Hex players to kill them in meetings
JuggernautInfo: Your cooldown decreases with each kill you get
PursuerInfo: Protect yourself and live to the end!
PhantasmInfo: Get killed and finish your tasks to win!
MaverickInfo: Survive until the end to win
CursedSoulInfo: Snatch souls and steal the win
RitualistInfo: Kill and reveal the roles of your enemies
VultureInfo: Eat bodies by reporting to win
MasochistInfo: Get attacked a few times to win!
MadmateInfo: 为自己的信仰，前仆后继！
NtrInfo: Everyone sees you as their Lover
TruantInfo: You freeze after meetings for some time
WorkhorseInfo: Be the first to complete all tasks and get more
AvangerInfo: You take someone with you upon death
HasteInfo: Your kill cooldown progresses while in vents
GuesserInfo: Guess roles of players in meetings to kill
NecroviewInfo: See the team of the dead
ReachInfo: You have a longer kill range
TrapperInfo: Freeze your killer for a few seconds
KnightedInfo: You have an extra vote (from the Monarch)
SleuthInfo: Know the roles of the bodies you report
TaskcounterInfo: You see the total tasks completed in real-time
StainedInfo: Your killer gets a violet name for 3s
DoubleShotInfo: You have an extra life when guessing
RascalInfo: You appear evil in some cases
GravestoneInfo: Your role is revealed when you die
LazyInfo: 懒惰，是人之天性，当坚守
SonarInfo: You have an arrow pointing to the nearest player
SwiftInfo: Your kills don't cause a lunge
UnluckyInfo: Everything has a chance to kill you
BardInfo: Poem's grace, murder's trace, a rhythmic dance in a dark embrace.
NukerInfo: 使用变形，挫骨扬灰，一个不留！
EngineerEHRInfoLong:
(船员职业):\n工程师可以在通信没有被破坏的情况下跳管,管道在通讯被破坏后无法使用.
\n背景故事:工程师其实并不是什么厉害人物,他之所以混进来这艘飞船是因为依托他的父亲——市长的推举,因此如你所见,他连使用飞船的高精尖设备也不会,只能掌握最基础的跳管,但是由于权势滔天,背靠关系,飞船上船长也不敢解雇他,所有人都只是把他和船员当作一个笑话,成为饭后闲谈,而工程师也觉得这样白吃白喝的日子也不赖,直到...他的到来.
ScientistEHRInfoLong:
(船员职业):\n科学家有一个便携式平板电脑,上面有船员的生命体征.你想咋用就咋用,获取自我报告,关于船员死几秒,是否是秒报的额外情报等...
\n背景故事:科学家是阿尔法制药公司的一个科研部工作人员,说是工作人员,其实是典型的偷税漏税,贪污受贿,作为身居高位的他居然还使用劣质原料和仪器降低成本,身价早已过千亿,这次飞船登录,是为了他自己寻得太空里一个叫做conasin的低成本高分子材料制作一台研究永生药的机器为己所用,这次出行他只带了生命检测仪器,方便有人受伤时狠狠敲诈一笔,但他没料到那个患者的到来...
ShapeshifterEHRInfoLong:
(内鬼职业):\n化形人有变形能力,可以用来陷害其他船员.化形的时候外观为一个蛋,变形也只是暂时的
\n背景故事:化形人其实是正常人类,但是他是一个[实验]失败的变体,他曾到阿尔法制药高价买下一款易容药品想要使自己重回青春,但是劣质的原料无法长期维持他的容貌,并且每当服药/药效结束的时候,他的皮肤会剥离,血肉膨胀充气像一个蛋壳,长期使得皮肤裂痕累累,不成人形,他听说科学家也来到了这艘飞船,因此,他一定要复仇!
GuardianAngelEHRInfoLong: (船员职业):\n作为守护天使,保护一个人可以让他免受死亡.
ImpostorEHRInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n内鬼的目标只是简单地杀死船员,你还可以破坏和跳管.
CrewmateEHRInfoLong: (船员职业):\n作为一个平民,你的使命便是干掉内鬼&中立,或者完成任务你也就赢了.
NoisemakerEHRInfoLong: (船员职业):\n作为广播员,当你死时,所有人会看到警报和一个指向你尸体的箭头.
TrackerEHRInfoLong: (船员职业):\n作为追踪者,绑定一个人之后可以在地图上查看他的行踪.
PhantomEHRInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n作为隐身人,你可以暂时隐身一段时间.这段时间里没人发现你.
BountyHunterInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n作为雇佣杀手,如果你杀死了你的目标,你的击杀CD会骤降,但如果不是,你的击杀CD会变长;赏金目标会定时更换.
FireWorksInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n作为爆破兵,通过变形/摸宠物安放烟花.如果内鬼只剩你了,你可以用变形/摸宠物让烟花爆炸并造成AOE伤害.但注意,你也会有可能被炸死.
SerialKillerInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n嗜血的天性让你的杀戮更快,但若不能及时用鲜血献祭给自己的灵魂,你便会死于非命.
MareInfoLong: (符文):\n作为暗夜杀手,黑暗会彻底爆发你杀戮的力量.但是黑暗中也会暴露你的名字.只有内鬼才会拥有暗夜杀手的符文&不会被赌.
VampireInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n夺心魄会给人以慢性死亡.但若是杀死了诱饵,仍然会产生秒报.
WarlockInfoLong:
(内鬼职业):
巫蛊者在不变形时可以对玩家下蛊.但是变形/摸宠物后(前提是下蛊了某个玩家),离他最近的玩家会把诅咒之人杀死(借刀杀人,即使对方没刀).你只能对1个人下蛊.

杀戮/变形/诅咒/摸宠物均有CD.巫蛊者杀人后可能会被冻在原地一段时间.
ZombieInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n僵尸的击杀CD很短,但移动速度很慢,视野极小.僵尸不会被专制者以外的人票出,僵尸的移动速度会随着击杀或时间流逝逐渐变的更慢.
AssassinInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n忍者用击杀来绑定一个目标,绑定成功会以盾碎作为提示.忍者用变形/摸宠物来无视距离传送&击杀标记的玩家,忍者不能进行常规击杀(房主可以更改这个设置).
HackerInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n欺诈师可以用变形绑定一个人,这个人会报告被欺诈师杀的尸体(无视位置),如果没人死,他就会自报,如果欺诈师选择到了懒人那么是没用的,因为他太懒了.
MinerInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n矿工在解除变形时会被传送到最近跳过的管道上(是跳进的管道哦).
MinimalismInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n无情杀手的击杀CD很快,但他也无法跳管&视野极低&无法破坏&无法报告&不能召开紧急会议.
EscapeeInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n潜逃者可以使用变形/摸宠物标记一个地点,当他下一次使用变形时会被传送回标记的地点(解除变形时不会有任何效果).
WitchInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n女巫可选择直接击杀/点击2次击杀下咒.诅咒之人会在会议上展现「†」这个标志.如果女巫在会议结束后还活着,被诅咒的玩家死亡.
MafiaInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n涅墨西斯乃古希腊神话中的复仇女神,只有队友逝去,她的复仇本性才被激发,屠杀才能开始,不过在涅墨西斯死后使用/rv [玩家ID]即可复仇带走一个玩家.
GodfatherInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n作为神父,你投票给某人即可标记某人.下一轮如果有人杀了他,那么凶手会变成流亡者.
PuppeteerInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n人偶师可以控制玩家并杀死离他最近的人(非内鬼).但如果被控制的玩家在接触时死了,人偶师也就死了,控制对懒人并没有用.
TimeThiefInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n每次当时间蛀虫杀死一名玩家,会议时间都会缩短.如果时间蛀虫死了,那么被偷窃的时间会还回来.
SniperInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n作为狙击手你可以远距离击杀,你需要进行两次变形/摸宠物执行狙击.第一次狙击是你的起始狙击点,第二次即为沿当前狙击方向狙击,你的名字旁边会有箭头指示你的狙击方向.另外狙击不会具有穿透能力,也就是说只能杀死路径上第一个人,在你用完你的子弹之后才能正常击杀.
EvilTrackerInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n邪恶追踪者可以追踪一个人并通过变形更换目标,但之后变形状态会立即取消.你名字旁的箭头就是指向目标的,当任意内鬼杀死目标时会有闪光.
EvilGuesserInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n邪恶赌怪可用/bt [玩家ID] [职业]这个命令猜测玩家身份.对了目标死;错了自己死./id可以展示所有对应玩家的ID.
AntiAdminerInfoLong:
(内鬼职业):
反监视者能察觉周遭设备使用情况,例如:管理地图,三岔路口日志,监控,生命仪器.
注意:你无法确认玩家是否在用这些设备,只能肯定有人靠近这些设备.

你可以用变形警告玩家远离这些设备,如果玩家不远离就死了(取决于房主设置).
SansInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n狂暴杀手每次击杀都能减少CD.
BomberInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n自爆兵可使用变形/摸宠物安置炸弹,造成AOE伤害,但代价是你也会死.注意:自爆兵爆炸时所有玩家都会看到击杀闪光.
ScavengerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nScavenger kills do not leave dead bodies behind. In addition, if the victim is a bait, no self-report will be made. To kill someone, you must click your kill button on them, then stay near that person for a few seconds, similar to an Arsonist douse.
BoobyTrapInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n连锁反应杀死玩家时会在尸体上放置陷阱,如果其他玩家报告了这个尸体就会死亡,这个玩家的尸体不能被报告且同样具有陷阱.这种连锁反应会持续到没有足够的玩家,但是连锁反应会在击杀之后立刻死亡,如果报告了他的尸体则不会触发陷阱.
CapitalismInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n奴隶主可以通过击杀给人安排一个额外任务.注意:技能不会在没有任务/已完成任务的玩家上生效.
GangsterInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n歹徒用击杀即可绑走一个人成为叛徒,如果有盾碎动画就是成功了.能绑架的最大玩家数目取决于房主.如果招募失败,目标会被撕票而亡,当招募次数为0,歹徒只能进行正常击杀.
CleanerInfoLong:
(内鬼职业):
清理工用报告即可清理一个尸体让它无法被报告.

注意: 只有在你CD好了的情况下才能清理.

如果清理成功,就会有盾碎动画作为提示,即使是诱饵的尸体也无法报告.
BallLightningInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n球状闪电无法进行正常击杀,球状闪电对目标进行击杀后,目标会在X秒内被汽化为量子幽灵,量子幽灵以“■”作为提示.若期间有非量子幽灵的玩家接触量子幽灵,量子幽灵会立刻量子化而死亡.若量子幽灵存活到会议则会在会议结束后死亡.任何对量子幽灵的主动互动(例如击杀)均无效.(根据房主设置,击杀球状闪电可能导致凶手汽化为量子幽灵).
GreedierInfoLong:
(内鬼职业):\n赌博者奇数次和偶数次的击杀,会拥有不同的击杀CD.每次开会都会重置赌博者的击杀cd,赌博者的第一次击杀永远是奇数次.
\n(定义{n|n=N},那么奇数:2n-1,偶数:2n).
CursedWolfInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n当咒狼被击杀时,咒狼会将凶手诅咒致死(诅咒次数根据房主设置).
ImperiusCurseInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n位移者完成变形后可以与变形的目标交换位置(若目标处于特殊状态例如死亡,被吞,或在管道内等则无事发生).
QuickShooterInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n当击杀CD结束时,快枪手可以通过变形重置击杀CD并储存一颗子弹(储存成功时快枪手身上会以盾碎动画(仅自己可见)作为提示).\n快枪手击杀后可以用子弹让击杀CD清零,直到子弹耗尽.每次会议开始快枪手只能保留一定数量的子弹(数量根据房主设置).
CamouflagerInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n隐蔽者变形后会让所有人蒙面,这个状态下所有人都看起来得一模一样.隐蔽者解除变形后技能失效\n注意:通讯破坏小黑人与隐蔽者的技能可以叠加,若隐蔽者发动技能期间召开会议则技能失效.
EraserInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n抹除者可以在会议上投票给任意船员阵营的目标以抹除目标的主职业,抹除将在会议结束后生效\n注意:抹除技能的玩家将被永远视为白板,包括游戏结算页面,且每名玩家只能被抹除一次.
OverKillerInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n肢解者击杀(包括被动击杀)的目标会出现多具尸体,以至于报告尸体时无法准确分辨其他受害者\n(注意:因实现原理,被击杀的目标不得不重复地显示自己被击杀的动画,此动画无法跳过且期间无法正常参与会议.此外,若肢解者肢解了复仇者,则复仇者会因愤怒杀光全场所有人).
HangmanInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n刽子手在变形期间的击杀对方视为绞杀,绞杀期间无视目标的任何被动技能(例如老兵的反杀,幸运人的闪躲等)被绞杀的玩家不会留下尸体,此外,灵媒也不会得到提示.
SwooperInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n隐匿者无法正常跳管.但可以通过跳管进入隐身状态,再次跳管则取消隐身状态.\n注意:当隐身时间结束时你会强制现形!
CrewpostorInfoLong: (隶属内鬼):\n隐狼不能击杀但拥有任务,每当隐狼完成任务时,距离隐狼最近的玩家就会死亡.
WildlingInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n庇佑者可以变形但不能跳管,当庇佑者击杀时,会暂时获得一个盾,免疫击杀(跟嗜血骑士一样).
TricksterInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n骗术师跟普通内鬼一样,不过骗术师被视为船员(法官审判骗术师会暴毙,警长不能执法骗术师,死神看骗术师是船员,告密者不能找到骗术师等).
VindicatorInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n传教士有额外票数,像市长一样(票数根据房主设置).
ParasiteInfoLong: (隶属内鬼):\n寄生虫和内鬼互不相认,除此之外寄生虫就是个普通内鬼.
DisperserInfoLong:
(内鬼职业):
分散者可以使用变形/摸宠物将所有玩家传送到随机管道上.

注意:分散者本身不会被变形传送,处于管道内的玩家也不能被传送.
InhibitorInfoLong:
(内鬼职业):
怜悯者在没有破坏的情况下才能击杀.

如果有重大破坏(如灯光或反应堆),则不能击杀,因为趁火打劫不是他的作风.
SaboteurInfoLong:
(内鬼职业):
破坏者在有重大破坏的情况下才能击杀.

(例如通信或氧气),此时你就可以击杀.
CouncillorInfoLong:
(内鬼职业):
议员与法官一样在会议上审判玩家,但是议员可以滥用职权且不计后果.

在会议中击杀时,这些击杀将显示为法官的审判.

审判指令/tl [id]
你可以在玩家名字前看到玩家的id或者使用/id命令查看所有玩家的 id.
DazzlerInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n眩晕者可以永久地减少变形目标的视野,当眩晕者被驱逐或死亡后,则眩晕者变形目标的视野会恢复如初.
DeathpactInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n作为恶魔,只需要变形成为一个玩家即可单方面签订契约,如果签订契约的玩家足够,那么他们需要及时相见,否则就会死去.\n如果玩家在契约生效之前死去,契约就会被撤销.
DevourerInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n作为蚕食者,变形可以让指定玩家的皮肤永久改变并且让你的击杀CD减少一些,但如果蚕食者死了/被投出,一切会恢复如初.
MorphlingInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n作为伪人,你只能在变形时击杀,毕竟你的天性就是隐藏.
TwisterInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n龙卷风可以使用变形来随机变换所有玩家的位置.\n他本身不会与任何人交换位置,处于管道上的玩家也同样无法被交换位置.
LurkerInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n矫健者身手敏捷无比,多跳几次管道可以减少一定的击杀CD.但是如果执行完了一次击杀,击杀CD会被重置回默认值.
ConvictInfoLong: (叛徒职业):\n你现在就是内鬼的人了!
VisionaryInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n作为外交官,和各个阵营周旋是你需要做的,变形成某一个人即可知晓对方所属阵营,你有至少一次的技能使用次数,每次击杀过后次数会增加,阵营不同显示的颜色不同,就像这样:\n<#8cffff>船员</color>;<#ff1919>内鬼</color>;<#ffab1b>中立</color>.
RefugeeInfoLong: (叛徒职业):\n流亡者通过回忆或者被神父洗脑获得这个职业,流亡者相当于普通内鬼.
UnderdogInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n弱者有较长的击杀CD,但是如果存活玩家数量达到一定值时,CD就变短了.
EvilDivinerInfoLong:
(内鬼职业):
谋士可以对一位玩家使用击杀按钮来得知目标的职业..

单击击杀按钮:查看选中目标的职业
双击:正常击杀目标

当次数用完了,击杀变为正常击杀.
LuckeyInfoLong: (船员职业):\n信徒虔诚于天,他自然备受眷顾,因此他有一定概率躲避击杀.\n可惜的是,凶手会看到信徒的盾碎,而信徒自己却感受不到天意...
NeedyInfoLong: (船员职业):\n懒人只有一个任务,另外,内鬼的技能对懒人无效,懒人也不会拥有附加职业.
SuperStarInfoLong: (船员职业):\n名媛理所应当是十分出名的,因此他的名字旁边会有个星作为标识且所有人可见.名媛只有在和凶手独处时才会被杀害.\n名媛是很洁身自好的,因此他不会参与赌博.
CyberStarInfoLong: (船员职业):\n博主在死亡的时候,船员们会看到红色的闪光并且在会议上得知博主的死亡消息.\n内鬼是不知情的.
DemolitionistInfoLong: (船员职业):\n作为奉献者,你死后地面会出现大范围爆炸,凶手仅有5秒跳管,否则就会被炸死,并且如果想活命就不要过早跳出管道.
TaskManagerInfoLong: (船员职业):\n在你名字旁边可以查看任务完成总数(对所有任务职业而言),并且会实时更新.
NiceEraserInfoLong: (船员职业):\n作为正义抹除者可以投票抹除一个人的职业,在会议之后会生效.抹除是有限的.
MayorInfoLong:
(船员职业):
市长投票时一票算作多票.
根据房主设置,市长还可能拥有跳通风管道触发紧急会议的技能.
根据房主设置,市长完成任务时会展现自己的身份,且无法被赌(市长后期生杀大权就体现出来了,要慎重哦).
ParanoiaInfoLong: (船员职业):\n被害妄想症可以通过管道/摸宠物报告自己,但实际上被害妄想症并没有死.
PsychicInfoLong: (船员职业):\n天眼能够在会议间看到数名玩家的名字以红色显示,其中至少1名是邪恶的.天眼成为叛徒时将准确地看到所有中立以及带刀船员玩家显示为红名.
SabotageMasterInfoLong:
(船员职业):
机械专家专为修复破坏而生.
修通讯,氧气,反应堆的破坏只需一边修复即可完成.
电力破坏只需开启一个开关.
只需开一扇门即可打开地图上全部的门.
SheriffInfoLong: (船员职业):\n警长没有任务,警长可以击杀内鬼(根据房主设置,警长也可以击杀中立阵营玩家).警长若尝试击杀船员阵营的玩家,警长将会走火自杀.警长成为叛徒时可以击杀任何人.
SnitchInfoLong:
(船员职业):
当告密者仅剩一个任务的时候,内鬼将会看到自己以及告密者的名称旁边有「★」作为提示.告密者成为叛徒时,「★」标记变为红色.当告密者完成所有任务后,将可以看到:
红色名称表示所有内鬼.
灰色名称表示带刀中立.
MarshallInfoLong: (船员职业):\n展现者通过完成任务向其他船员展示自己的身份.设置决定了哪些阵营的人可以看到你.
SpeedBoosterInfoLong: (船员职业):\n增速者每次完成任务都会增加移速.
DoctorInfoLong: (船员职业):\n法医可以查看生命监测装置并确认死亡玩家的死因.查看的时间长短=设备的充能数.
DictatorInfoLong: (船员职业):\n当专制者在会议阶段投票某个玩家后,会议会被强制结束并放逐他.但专制的代价是会自杀.
DetectiveInfoLong: (船员职业):\n侦探报告尸体后,会收到一条线索消息,该消息会告诉侦探被尸体的职业,根据房主设置,侦探可能知道凶手的职业是什么.\n注意:侦探不会拥有懦弱的符文.
UndercoverInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Impostors knows who Undercover is and sees him as a teammate, but Undercover himself does not know who the Impostors are.
NiceGuesserInfoLong: (船员职业):\n正义赌徒可以在会议期间猜测某个人的身份,猜对那个人死,错了自己死.使用/bt [玩家ID] [职业名字] 执行猜测,如果不知道玩家ID可以使用/id查看.
SwordsManInfoLong: (船员职业):\n剑客可以无视后果执行1次击杀,并且没任务.
TransporterInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nTransporter swaps two random players; ignored if not enough players. Vent players aren't selected.
TimeManagerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nTime Manager increases meeting time. If it dies, the meeting time returns to normal. If it becomes Madmate, skill changes to reducing meeting time.
VeteranInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nVeteran can enter the alert state by venting/petting. If attacked while alerted, the veteran will kill the murderer instead.
CopyCatInfoLong:
(船员职业):
效颦者只能复制船员角色.
依据房主设置,如果你试图复制非船员角色,你可以杀死他们.
另外,你无权参与赌注,并且如果你复制失败的次数过多,你便会死.
BodyguardInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Bodyguard can prevent a kill by sacrificing themselves when a player is about to be killed nearby. Their skills impact any team, but when they become a Madmate and the murderer is an Impostor, their skill won't activate.
CounterfeiterInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Deceiver can sell the counterfeit to other players through the kill button. If the counterfeit is sold successfully, the Deceiver will see a shield animation on their body as a reminder. The counterfeit will take effect after the end of the next meeting. If the player with no kill ability holds the counterfeit, he will kill himself immediately. If the player with the killing ability has the counterfeit, he will commit suicide when he tries to kill someone next time.
GrenadierInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nGrenadiers can use a vent/pet to throw a flashbang that impairs Impostors' vision. The flashbang may also affect neutrals, depending on the host's settings. The Grenadier will see a shield animation on their body after the flashbang takes effect. Flashbangs only work on Crewmates when the Grenadier becomes a Madmate.
LighterInfoLong:
(Crewmate):
As the Lighter, you can vent/pet to increase your vision temporarily. You have increased vision both when the lights are not out and when the lights are out.

Use this power to catch sneaky killers!
MedicInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Medic can place a shield on the target by pressing the Kill button. The Medic can only give one shield for the whole game; when the Medic dies, the target's shield will be removed. The Medic can also see if someone is trying to break the target's shield.\nDepending on the host's settings, the Medic or the target can see if the player has a shield (shown as a green circle 「●」 next to the name).
DivinatorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Fortune Teller can get a clue to a player's role by voting for them in a meeting. Once all tasks are complete, they get the exact role instead of a clue.
GlitchInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Glitch, your goal is to kill everyone on the ship. You can hack players to prevent them from killing, venting, sabotaging, and reporting dead bodies for a limited time. You can also call sabotage or pet to disguise as a random player for a limited time (the sabotage won't occur).
JudgeInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Judge can judge a player during the meeting. If the target is evil, it's killed; if it's wrong, the Judge dies. Use the /tl [player id] command to judge and /id to view player IDs. Judges can judge all players when they're Madmate.
MorticianInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nWhen the Mortician reports a body, they will know the last player the victim had contact with. Note: Mortician won't be Oblivious or Seer.
MediumshiperInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Medium can contact a dead player after they are reported. The dead player can answer once with a YES or NO to the Medium's question (using /ms yes or /ms no). The Medium won't be Oblivious.
ObserverInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Observer can see all shield animations caused by other players after the first meeting.
MonarchInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Monarch, you can knight players to give them an extra vote.

You cannot knight someone who already has extra votes.
Knighted players appear with a golden name.
DovesOfNeaceInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nPacifist resets kill cooldown for all players with kill button on vent/pet. Madmate only works on Crewmates.
FarseerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs an Investigator, use your kill button to reveal the role of a nearby player. A 「○」 will be displayed next to the reveal target. Stay near the target for a defined time to reveal their role.
BloodhoundInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs a Coroner, you can't report corpses; instead, after trying to report the corpse, you will see an arrow leading you to the killer. If a meeting is called, the arrows disappear. Depending on the setting, the body you found cannot be reported.
ScoutInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs a Scout, you can vote for a player in the meeting, which will mark their position for you in the game with arrows. In addition, at the beginning of a meeting, you will be shown in which room the player was last if the option is activated.
MerchantInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Merchant, you sell a random add-on to a random player for each task you complete. Each add-on sold earns you money. If you have a certain amount of money, you can avert the next killing attempt against you by bribing the murderer. The bribed player won't be able to kill you, but you don't know who it is. The bribe money used is lost and is not available for additional bribes.
DeputyInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Deputy, use your kill button on a player to reset their kill cooldown.

If the target does not have a kill button, then the handcuff was a waste.
GuardianInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Guardian, you become immortal on task completion. You can be guessed in meetings, though.
AddictInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Addict has a suicide timer indicated by the vent cooldown. If the timer expires, the Addict dies. After venting, the Addict is immortal for a certain time. The Addict is also frozen for a defined time after freezing and cannot report any bodies.
TracefinderInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Tracefinder, you have access to vitals much like a Scientist. In addition, you get arrows pointing to dead bodies.
OracleInfoLong: (Crewmates): As the Oracle, you may vote for a player during a meeting. You'll see if they are a crewmate, neutral, or Impostor. But be careful! This has a chance of giving you an incorrect result! (The host sets the chance)
SpiritualistInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Spiritualist, you will get an arrow pointing to the ghost of the body that was reported in the last meeting.

If the player was good, it may lead you to an Impostor or neutral killer.
If the player was bad, it may just lead you to a fellow crewmate.
ChameleonInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Chameleon, you can vent to disguise (invisible). While disguising, nobody can interact with you. Venting while disguised will reveal yourself.
ParityCopInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nTo check if two players are on the same team, use the command /cp [player id 1] [player id 2]. Neutral killers are counted as part of the same team. Non-Killing Neutrals are counted as separate teams. The Trickster is counted as crew, and Madmates are counted as Impostor. The Lawyer/Follower and its target count as the same team. You will receive an affirmation message if they are in the same team or a denial message if they are not.
TimeMasterInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Time Master, use the vents/pet to mark everyone's position. When using the ability again, every alive player will be teleported back to the marked positions.

During the ability duration, and the Time Master gains a time shield, which protects them from death.
CrusaderInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Crusader, use your kill button to crusade a player. If that player gets attacked, you'll kill the attacker.
ArsonistInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nArsonist can douse by clicking the kill button on a player and following them for a few seconds. When dousing starts, successful dousing is indicated by a shield animation (only visible to themselves). When the Arsonist douses all surviving players, they can vent/pet their pet to start a fire and win alone. If player name shows 「△」, they're being doused; if it shows 「▲」, they're completely doused.
JesterInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nJester wins alone if voted out but loses if still alive at the end. Jester, Executioner, and Innocent can win together.
TerroristInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nIf the Terrorist completes all tasks and dies, they win the game alone.
ExecutionerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nThe Executioner has a target with a diamond symbol next to their name. If the target dies, the Executioner may become a Crewmate, Jester, or Opportunist. If the target is voted out, the Executioner wins.
LawyerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nLawyer has a target to defend, which will be indicated by a diamond 「♦」 next to their name. If your target wins, you win. If they lose, you lose.
OpportunistInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nIf the Opportunist is alive at the end, they win with the winning team.
MarioInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nVector will win alone by venting a certain number of times.
JackalInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nConvert a player with your Kill button. If you die, they will become the new Jackal. You win once you achieve majority and no other evil teams exist.
GodInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nGod knows everyone's role from the beginning, and God will win alone as long as he lives to the end. Note: God won't be Lovers.
InnocentInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nInnocent players can use the kill button to plant another player, causing them to die immediately. If the planted player is voted out in a meeting, the Innocent wins. Note that the Jester, Executioner, and Innocent can win together.
PelicanInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Pelican, you can use the kill button and swallow a player alive. Swallowed players are teleported out of the map and cannot interact with the game. In case of an emergency meeting or reporting a dead body, all swallowed players die instantly. This is not a standard way to kill, and role skills such as the Bodyguard and Veteran are ineffective. If you die or disconnect, all previously swallowed players are returned to your location.
RevolutionistInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nThe Revolutionist can recruit players by clicking the kill button on them and following them for a few seconds. If recruiting is successful, a shield animation is shown as a reminder. Players recruited are likely to be immediately killed, a probability set by the host. The Revolutionist and all recruited players win if the specified number of players vent within the set time, otherwise, the recruited player dies. The Revolutionist dies if killed during a countdown or at a meeting. Players who died after recruitment can still win with the Revolutionist.
FFFInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Hater, you can kill as often as you want with no cooldown and have impostor vision. You can only kill Lovers, recruited players, and recruiting roles, or you will die. Winning is possible if you kill at least one player during the game.
GamerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nIf the number of Demons is greater than Crewmates, Demons win. Demons have a unique health-based killing system, and killing takes effect when one's health is exhausted. If a Demon's health is consumed but they are not killed, the murderer will see a shield animation as a reminder.
DarkHideInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nThe Stalker can kill anyone and cause electricity sabotage. They cannot vent. If the Stalker is alive and the Impostor or Crewmate wins, the Stalker wins alone.
WorkaholicInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nWorkaholics win by completing more tasks, maybe even after their death.
CollectorInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nCollectors can gather all the votes cast by a target in a meeting. When they collect the specified number of votes, they win, even over exiled players.
PoisonerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Poisoner, your kills are delayed. Kill everyone to win.
SidekickInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nHelp your Jackal kill. If they die, you will become the new Jackal. Upon transforming, convert a player with your Kill button. You (and all other Jackals and Sidekicks) win once you achieve majority and no other evil teams exist.
ProvocateurInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nThe Provocateur can kill any target with the kill button. If the target loses at the end of the game, the Provocateur wins with the winning team.
BloodKnightInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nBlood Knights win if they're the last killing role alive and crewmates are equal or less than them. They gain temporary shields after every kill, making them immortal for a few seconds.
PlagueBearerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
Plague everyone using your kill button to turn into Pestilence. Once you turn into Pestilence, you will become immortal (for the most part) and gain the ability to kill.
In addition to this, After turning into Pestilence, you will kill anyone who tries to kill you directly.

You can only win if you turn into Pestilence.
PestilenceInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As Pestilence, you're an unstoppable machine. Any attack towards you will be reflected towards them. Indirect kills don't even kill you.

Only way to kill Pestilence is by vote, or by it misguessing.
TotocalcioInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nThe Follower can start following someone by using their Kill button and switch targets by using it again. If the Follower's target wins, the Follower will win, too. They can even win after they die.
SuccubusInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nIf there are more Cultists than Crewmates and only these two teams remain, the Cultist team wins. The Cultist can charm a non-neutral player by pressing the kill button, making them a part of the Cultist team with new victory conditions.
HexMasterInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Hex Master, you can hex players or kill them. Hexing a player works the same as spelling as a Witch.
WraithInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Wraith, you can use vents to go invisible temporarily. Trying to vent while invisible will cause you to become visible again.

Kill; everyone to win.
NSerialKillerInfoLong: (中立职业):\n连环杀手只需要不停的杀戮即可
JuggernautInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Juggernaut, your kill cooldown decreases with each kill you make.

Kill everyone to win.
VirusInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nThe virus' goal is to eliminate other players. When a crewmate is killed, their corpse is infected, and the reporting crewmate joins the virus team or dies if the Virus isn't voted out. The Virus team wins if they outnumber the Crewmate team.
PursuerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Pursuer, you can use your ability on someone to make them shoot a blank when they try to kill (= reset their kill cooldown).

To win, survive to the end of the game.
PhantasmInfoLong: (中立职业):\n幻影要被击杀后并完成任务,可以在存活的时候完成任务,但是存活到最后就无法胜利了.如果被杀了&任务完成了,就和当前获胜的阵营一起获胜.
JinxInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Jinx, whenever you are attacked, you jinx them, resulting in them dying to a jinx. This has limited uses.

Kill off everyone to win.
MaverickInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Maverick, you can kill much like a Serial Killer. You win with the winning team rather than alone. If you die, you lose.
CursedSoulInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Cursed Soul, you snatch the victory if you survive to the end of the game.

You can snatch the win from a Jester or Executioner.

Additionally, you can snatch the souls of other players.
Soulless players win with you and count as dead.
RitualistInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Ritualist, you can reveal the roles of other players using your kill button.

Single click: Reveal role
Double click: Kill

If you run out of reveal uses, your kill button functions normally.
PickpocketInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Pickpocket, you steal votes from your kills.

Kill everyone to win.
TraitorInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Traitor, you were an Impostor that betrayed the Impostors. You know the Impostors, but they don't know you. The twist? They can kill you, but you can't kill them.

Eliminate the Impostors by other means, then kill everyone else to win!
VultureInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Vulture, report bodies to win!

When you report a body, if your eat cooldown is up, you'll eat the body (makes it unreportable).
If your eat ability is still on cooldown, then you'll report the body normally.

Additionally, you'll report bodies normally if the maximum bodies eaten per round is reached.
MedusaInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Medusa, you can stone bodies much like cleaning a body when your kill cooldown is up. Stoned bodies cannot be reported.

Kill everyone to win.
SpiritcallerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Spiritcaller, your victims become Evil Spirits after they die. These spirits can help you win by freezing other players for a short time and/or blocking their vision. Alternatively, the spirits can give you a shield that protects you briefly from an attempted kill.
AmnesiacInfoLong: (Neutrals): As the Amnesiac, use your kill or report button (depends on the Host's settings) on a player to copy someone's role. If the target was an Impostor, you'll become a Renegade. If the target was a crewmate, you'll become a Sheriff. If the target was a passive neutral or a neutral killer not specified, you'll become the role defined in the settings. If the target was a neutral killer of a select few, you'll become the role they are.
DoomsayerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
The Doomsayer can guess the role of a certain player during the meeting. If the Doomsayer guesses a certain number of roles (the number depends on the host settings), then he wins.

The guessing command is: /bt [player id] [role]
You can see the player's id before the player's name, or use the /id command to view the id of all players.
LoversInfoLong: (Add-ons),\nLovers win together and may die together if one is exiled or killed. They can see the ♥ mark next to each other's name. If one of the lovers wins at the end, the other wins too.
MadmateInfoLong: (符文):\n持有此血色符文,你就属于内鬼了.只有船员才能持有此符文,并且特殊的船员职业的技能还会发生变化.\n例如掷弹兵的闪光弹只能作用于船员和中立,警长可以乱杀等等.
WatcherInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nDuring the meeting, Watcher can see everyone's votes.
MagnetInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen you kill, your victims lunge to you, instead of you lunging to them
SleuthInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou know the roles of the bodies you report.
TaskcounterInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nTask Counter can see the total number of tasks completed (by everyone all together) next to their role name, which updates in real-time.
BloodlustInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou can kill. You are a neutral killer while keeping your role's ability (as much as host-only limitations allow).\nIf your role has an ability to be used through the kill button, you can single-click to use your ability and double-click the kill button to kill.
StainedInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYour killer gets a violet name for 3 seconds.
ClumsyInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhile walking, you have a small chance of tripping, meaning you freeze for a few seconds.
DiscoInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou change your skin color every few seconds.
SonarInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou see an arrow pointing to the nearest player.
TorchInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nOnly Crewmates will get Torch, who have increased vision and may not be affected by Lights Sabotage.
SeerInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen a player dies, the Seer sees a red flash (with an alarm sound like sabotage).
BrakarInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nIn case of a tie, the target voted by the Tiebreaker has priority. However, if multiple Tiebreakers choose different targets simultaneously, their skills will not take effect.
ObliviousInfoLong: (符文):\n侦探和清理工不会拥有懦弱的符文,持有此符文将会无法报告尸体.请注意:持有此符文击杀诱饵还是会自动报告,此外懦弱可以照常成为欺诈师的目标.
BewilderInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nBewilder's vision changes killer's vision on death.
TruantInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAfter each meeting, you freeze in place for a set amount of seconds.
WorkhorseInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nComplete all tasks to become Workhorse and get extra tasks set by the host.
FoolInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nImpostors and Mechanics won't be Fool. Fools can't repair any sabotage.
AvangerInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nHost can allow Impostor to become Avenger. If Avenger dies, they'll revenge a random player.
YoutuberInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nIf the YouTuber is the first player killed, they win. If not, they follow the Crewmate to win. Note: Indirect killing methods don't trigger the YouTuber's skills.
EgoistInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nOnly impostors can get Egoist. If the impostor team wins while there's at least one Impostor alive who isn't an Egoist, the Egoist loses.\nIn order for the Egoist to win, they must eject all other impostors and stay alive.
TicketsStealerInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nStealers gets additional votes every time they kill someone.
DualPersonalityInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nNeutrals and Madmates can't become Schizophrenic. The Schizophrenic will be considered as two players in the game. Having at least one player as Schizophrenic won't end the game if there are only them and the Impostor left.
MimicInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nMimic is an Impostor role. When a Mimic dies, other Impostors receive a message during meetings that reveals the roles killed by the Mimic.
GuesserInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As a guesser, guess the roles of players in meetings to kill them. Guessing wrong kills you instead.

The guessing command is: /bt [player id] [role]
You can see the player's id before the player's name, or use the /id command to view the id of all players.
NecroviewInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
The Necroview can see the teams of dead players. The following info will be displayed on the dead player's name while in a meeting:
- The Red name indicates the Impostors.
- The Cyan name indicates the Crewmates.
- The Orange name indicates the Neutrals.
ReachInfoLong: (Add-on)\nOnly roles with a kill button can get this add-on. You have the longest kill range possible in the game, unlike everyone else.
BaitInfoLong: (符文):\n杀死诱饵的凶手会自报,自报延迟根据房主设置.
TrapperInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen Beartrap is killed, Beartrap immobilizes killer for a configurable amount of time.
CharmedInfoLong: (Betrayal Add-ons):\nThe Charmed add-on is obtained by being charmed by the Cultist. Once charmed, you are now on the Cultist's team and no longer on your original team.
OnboundInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWith the Onbound add-on, you cannot be guessed in meetings.
KnightedInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen a Monarch knights someone, they get an extra vote.
AsthmaticInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou always have a symbol below your name with a timer that is red or green. You cannot move when the symbol/timer is red. The timer indicates when the color will change.
UnreportableInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWith the Disregarded add-on, your corpse cannot be reported.
HasteInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWith the Haste add-on, your kill cooldown continues to go down at all times.
ContagiousInfoLong:
(Betrayal Add-ons):
When the Virus infects you, you become contagious. Contagious players are on the Virus team.

Whether or not you die after a meeting depends on the settings for the Virus.
LuckyInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWith the Lucky add-on, there is a probability for you to evade the kill; the specific probability is set by the host. When the evasion takes effect, the killer will see the shield animation, but you will not know anything.
DoubleShotInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen a player with Double Shot guesses a role incorrectly, they will get a second chance to guess, but the next wrong guess will result in suicide.
RascalInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Rascal, you can die to the Sheriff, and Snitch can find you if Snitch can find madmates.

Only assigned to Crewmates, cannot be assigned by the Merchant.
SoullessInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
When a Cursed Soul snatches your soul, you get this add-on.

You are not counted as alive.
GravestoneInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Gravestone, your role is revealed to everyone when you die.
LazyInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Lazy, you are too lazy to walk to the meeting table when meetings are called, so you start the next round exactly where you ended the previous one, and you're also immune to Warlocks, Puppeteers, and Gangsters.
AutopsyInfoLong: (符文):\n拥有尸检符文,你可以看到玩家是如何死亡的.此符文不能分配给法医,溯源者,科学家和阳光男大.
LoyalInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Loyal, you cannot be recruited by roles such as Jackal or Cultist.

Cannot be assigned to neutrals.
EvilSpiritInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs Evil Spirit, it's your job to help the Spiritcaller to victory. You can use your Haunt button to freeze players and reduce their vision. Alternatively, you can use your Haunt button to give the Spiritcaller a shield against a kill attempt temporarily.
RecruitInfoLong:
(Betrayal Add-ons):
As a recruit, you are on the Jackal's team and help out the Jackal and their Sidekicks.

You cannot win with your original team.
GlowInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Glow, your name is colored during a lights sabotage.
DiseasedInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen someone tries to use the kill button on you, their cooldown will be increased by a configurable amount of time
AntidoteInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen someone tries to use the kill button on you, their cooldown will be decreased by a configurable amount of time
SwiftInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Swift, your kills will not cause you to lunge.
UndeadInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nThis add-on is given to players that the Necromancer and the Deathknight have recruited to the Undead faction.
UnluckyInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Unlucky, doing tasks, killing, or venting as a chance to kill you.
SunglassesInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Sunglasses, your vision is reduced.
GMInfoLong: (None):\nThe Game Master is an observer role. Their presence does not affect the game; all players know who the Game Master is. The Game Master role will be assigned to the host, who will automatically become a ghost at the start of the game.
SunnyboyInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nThe Sunnyboy can check the life status of others through the life panel. When the Sunnyboy is alive, the game will not end due to a numerical advantage (for example, the number of Impostors is greater than the crew, or there are no survivors). If the Sunnyboy dies at the end of the game, the Sunnyboy will win with the winning team.
BardInfoLong: (Impostors):\nWhen a bard is alive, the exile confirmation will display a sentence composed by the bard. Whenever the bard completes a creation, the bard's kill cooldown is permanently halved.
NukerInfoLong: (内鬼职业):\n作为洲际导弹,你有更强大的爆炸威力.通过变形/摸宠物来引爆核弹.你不能杀人,你会死在爆炸中,但若能够挫骨扬灰,这一切都是值得的.

ShareLobbyMinPlayer: Share Lobby Code When The Number Of Players Reaches
BlockDisturbancesToSwitches: 当电力修复好的时候阻止再次破坏
KickNotJoinedPlayersRegularly: Kick players who haven't joined the game every 25s in lobby
ChangeNameToRoleInfo: Show Role Info to Unmodded Clients Round 1
SendRoleDescriptionFirstMeeting: Show Role Descriptions to Unmodded Clients on First Meeting
ZiplineTravelTimeFromBottom: Zipline Travel Time from Bottom to Top
ZiplineTravelTimeFromTop: Zipline Travel Time from Top to Bottom
CTA.PlayersCanWinWithOriginalTeam: Custom Teamed Players Can Win With Their Original Team
CTA.PlayersCanSeeEachOthersRoles: Custom Teamed Players Can See Each Other's Roles

PlayersNotReadyTitle: <#ffff00><#ffab1b>{0}</color> players are not ready!</color> They are:
ShieldPersonDiedFirst: Shield the person who got killed first in the last game
ArsonistMinPlayersToIgnite: Minimum Doused Players required to Ignite
ArsonistMaxPlayersToIgnite: Maximum Amount of Doused Players at once
MyRoleCommandHelp: <size=80%><#00ffa5>⇨ Type <#00a5ff>/m</color> in the next meeting for the full description of your role ⇦</color></size>
FreezeAfterCurseKill: Freeze After Killing via Cursed Player
OutOfAbilityUsesDoMoreTasks: <color=#ffff00>Out of ability uses! Do tasks to get more!</color>
SniperCanKill: <color=#ff1919>狙击手</color>可以在还有子弹的时候正常击杀
EGCanGuessTaskDoneSnitch: 可以赌注完成任务的<color=#b8fb4f>告密者</color>
GCanGuessTaskDoneSnitch: 可以赌注完成任务的<color=#b8fb4f>告密者</color>
PuppeteerMinDelay: 人偶玩家杀人之前的最小延迟时长
PuppeteerMaxDelay: 人偶玩家杀人之前的最大延迟时长
PuppeteerManipulationEndsAfterFixedTime: 人偶在特定时间后被解除控制
PuppeteerManipulationEndsAfterTime: 人偶师的控制在特定时间之后结束
PuppeteerPuppetCanKillImpostors: 人偶可以杀死其他<color=#ff1919>内鬼</color>
PuppeteerDiesAfterMaxPuppets: <color=#ff1919>人偶师</color>在没有人偶之后死去
PuppetDiesAlongWithVictim: Puppet Dies Along With The Victim
ScavengerKillDuration: 抛尸者击杀完成后的持续时长
ChanceOfSeeingAllAlignmentsOnStart: Chance Of Seeing All Alignments On Game Start
SabotageMasterSkillLimit: 技能的最大使用次数（不包括修复门）
SabotageMasterFixesDoors: 可以打开地图上所有的门
SabotageMasterFixesCommunications: 可单独修复通讯（拥有双通讯设备的地图适用）
SabotageMasterFixesElectrical: 只需一个开关就能修复灯
SMUsesUsedWhenFixingReactorOrO2: Uses it takes to fix Reactor/O2
SMUsesUsedWhenFixingLightsOrComms: Uses it takes to fix Lights/Comms
SheriffCanKillNeutralsMode: 针对于<color=#ffab1b>中立</color>职业的配置
SheriffMisfireKillsTarget: 误杀好人的同时击杀目标
SheriffShowShotLimit: 在名称旁边显示最大执法次数
DoctorTaskCompletedBatteryCharge: 完成任务增加的设备充能数
SnitchEnableTargetArrow: 完成任务后显示一个指向最近的坏人的箭头
SnitchCanGetArrowColor: 对不同阵营的坏人显示不同颜色的箭头
SnitchRemainingTaskFound: 在剩余多少任务时被坏人发现
SidekickSheriffCanGoBerserk: <color=#00b4eb>被招募</color>的<color=#f8cd46>警长</color>可以随意执法
SerialKillerLimit: 反噬倒计时的时间上限
CanIgniteBeforePlacingAllFireworks: 可以在放置所有烟花之前让已安装的烟花爆炸
NameDisplayAddons: Display Add-Ons next to the role name
TorchAffectedByLights: <color=#eee5be>Torch</color>'s vision is affected by Lights Sabotage
LoverDieConsequence: Consequence for Second <color=#ff9ace>Lover</color>, When First One Dies
LoverKnowRoles: <color=#ff9ace>Lovers</color> know the roles of each other
CrewLoversWinWithCrew: If Both <color=#ff9ace>Lovers</color> are <color=#8cffff>Crewmates</color>, they always win with <color=#8cffff>Crewmates</color>
PrivateChat: Enable Private Chat for <color=#ff9ace>Lovers</color> <#ffff00>(VERY EXPERIMENTAL!!!!)</color> (REQUIRES DOUBLE EJECTION SCREEN)
GuessLovers: Sorry, host's settings do not allow to guess <color=#ff9ace>Lovers</color>.
GuessVanillaCrewmate: Host settings don't allow to guess someone as the vanilla Crewmate
RogueKnowEachOtherRoles: <color=#696969>Rogues</color> know the roles of each other
TimeThiefDecreaseMeetingTime: 每次击杀缩短的会议时间
TimeThiefLowerLimitVotingTime: 时间蛀虫存活时会议的最小时间
TimeThiefReturnStolenTimeUponDeath: 死亡时归还被偷走的时间
EvilTrackerCanSeeLastRoomInMeeting: 可以在会议中知晓追踪目标的最后停留房间
TrackerCanGetArrowColor: 可以看到带颜色的箭头
DetectiveCanknowAddons: 可以确认死亡玩家所持符文
DetectiveCanknowKillTime: 可以知道具体死亡时间
EveryOneKnowSuperStar: 所有人都知道谁是<color=#f6f657>名媛</color>
ZombieSpeedReduce: 一段时间后，<color=#ff1919>僵尸</color>的移动速度就会降低
BomberRadius: 爆炸范围（5x大约能炸半个食堂）
NotifyGodAlive: Inform players at meetings that God is still alive
SupportsPetMessage: \n\n<#00ff00>[✓] This role supports Pet button usage for ability triggers or other actions, maybe replacing venting, shapeshifting or killing.</color>
UsePetInsteadOfKillButton: Use Pet Button As Kill Button
UsePets: Use Pet button instead of Vent / Shapeshift
UseVoteCancelling: Use Vote Cancelling Method instead of Commands
UseVoteCancellingAfterVote: Can Vote Normally After Using Ability (Vote)
WaitFor1Kill: Suicide Timer starts after First Kill
InnocentCanWinByImp: If their target was an <color=#ff1919>Impostor</color> then they win with them
BaitDelayNotify: <color=#ffff00>Warn the killer about the upcoming self-report</color>
BaitAdviceAlive: {0} is the Bait. Whoever kills the Bait will commit self report.
RevolutionistDrawCount: Amount of Players needed to Tag
MedicResetCooldown: On kill attempt, reset murderer's cooldown to
BallLightningConvertTime: 汽化为量子幽灵的持续时间
BallLightningKillerConvertGhost: 被击杀时凶手汽化为量子幽灵
CanCountNeutralKiller: When <color=#8cffff>Crewmates</color> win by killing a <color=#ffab1b>Neutral</color> player, they can snatch the victory
EnergeticInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Energetic, the cooldown of your ability is reduced by 25%.
MessengerInfo: Send a Message to Players After Death
MessengerInfoLong: (Add-ons): As the Messenger, after you die, you can send a message in a meeting to the alive players by typing /hm {number}, replacing {number} with the corresponding index of the messages listed below: 1. The player that killed me was last in Example: The player that killed me was last in Cafeteria 2. The killer's role is Example: The killer's role is Ninja 3. I was a(n) Example: I was a Crewmate Example use: /hm 1 - This will send the first message to the alive players.
MessengerMessage.1: The player that killed me was last in {0}
EvolverInfo: Select an Upgrade After Each Meeting
EvolverInfoLong: (Neutrals): As the Evolver, you can choose an upgrade after each meeting. Pet to cycle between the available upgrades. The same upgrade can appear multiple times. Once the timer to pick ends, your upgrade will be applied. Upgrades: - Decrease Kill Cooldown (by 2.5s) - Gain Impostor Vision (unaffected by lights sabotage) - Increase Vision (by 0.4x) - Increase Speed (by 0.25x) - Increase Kill Distance (Short → Medium → Long) - Gain Venting Ability (and 1 use) - Increase Venting Use Limit (by 3) - Gain Sabotage Ability (and 1 use) - Increase Sabotage Use Limit (by 2) - Gain Shield (cannot be killed in the current round) Remarks: If you can vent, the number of vent uses you have is displayed next to your role name like this: (V: 1) - Same with the sabotage use limit: (S: 2)
EvolverSuffix: <size=85%>Selected upgrade will be applied in <#00ffa5>{0}s</color>\nSelected upgrade: <#00ffa5>{1}</color> (Pet to cycle)\n<size=70%>Available upgrades: <#00ffa5>{2}</color></size></size>
WorkaholicGiveAdviceAlive: Advice at first meeting if alive, can win after death, ghost tasks ON
DoctorVisibleToEveryone: 每个人都知道谁是<color=#80ffdd>法医</color>
MeetingReserved: Max Bullets reserved for a meeting
AccurateCheckMode: Can know specific role when tasks are not done
WhenTargetIsNeutral: When Target is Neutral (& erasing via kill button)
NiceEraserHideVote: 隐藏<color=#00a5ff>正义的抹除者</color>的投票
KB_BootVentWhenDead: Boot players who get stuck in the vent (may trigger official anti cheating)
SwooperVentNormallyOnCooldown: 当<color=#ff1919>隐匿者</color>隐形还在CD时可以正常跳管.
WraithVentNormallyOnCooldown: <color=#4b0082>Wraith</color> vents normally when invis is on cooldown
RoleBlockNotify: You are role blocked, you can't {0}
TotocalcioBetTargetKnowTotocalcio: Follower target knows who the Follower is
ShowSpecificRole: Know specific roles on Task Completion
SuccubusCharmCooldownIncrese: Increases Charm Cooldown For Each Charm
YourLawyerIsNotify: Your <color=#008080>Lawyer</color> is {0}. They win if you win.
ShowLongInfo: Show Long Role Descriptions instead of Short ones
ResetKillCooldownWhenPlayerGetKilled: Reset kill cooldown if someone gets killed by another player
AddictWarning: <#ffff00>You must vent soon or you'll suicide!</color>
TriedToKillLastGameFirstKill: Your target was the first to die in the last game.\nLet them play!
CheckMurderFail: <#ff0000>The murder was canceled due to the following reason:\n</color>

UndertakerInfo: Take bodies whereever you want to
UndertakerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Undertaker, you can mark your target using your kill button, then shapeshift/pet to kill them. However, the person you assassinate will teleport to your location when you shapeshift, so their body will be wherever you are! Use this well to hide bodies!
RomanticInfo: Select your partner and win with them
RomanticInfoLong:
(Neutral):
As the Romantic, you can first use your kill button on someone to select them as your partner.
After that, as long as both you and your partner are alive, you can use your kill button on anyone to give your partner a temporarily shield. If your partner wins, you win too.

If your partner dies, your role will change according to the following conditions:
If your partner had a kill button of any type, you will get the same role as they were.
If your partner was a Non-Killing Neutral or your partner died by themselves (suicided or has no real killer), you will turn into the Ruthless Romantic, which is a basic neutral killer: Be the last one standing to win. If you win, your partner wins too.
If your target was an Impostor, you become a Renegade. Your job is now to help the impostors (and thus your partner) win.
In every other case, you become the Vengeful Romantic. Your goal is to kill the killer of your partner. If you do so, you and your partner win with the winning team. If you try to kill anyone else, you will die.
VengefulRomanticInfo: Kill the killer of your Partner
VengefulRomanticInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs Vengeful Romantic you need to  kill the killer of your partner. You only get one shot. If you kill wrong player, you misfire. Upon killing the right target you win with the winning team along with your Romantic Partner
RuthlessRomanticInfoLong: (Neutral):\nYou become Ruthless Romantic if your Romantic Partner (a Neutral Killer) was killed. Now you go on a killing spree and kill eveyrone. You win with your Romantic Partner if you are the only one left.
RomanticBetOnYou: The Romantic chose you as their Partner!
RomanticGetsPartnerConvertedAddons: <color=#ff1493>Romantic</color> gets the converted add-ons of their partner
RomanticArrows: <color=#ff1493>Romantic</color> has arrows pointing to their Partner
RomanticPartnerHasArrows: Partner has arrows pointing to the <color=#FF1493>Romantic</color>
SpiritualistTargetMessage: <color=#ffff00>The Spiritualist has an arrow pointing toward you</color>
GaslighterInfo: Make others doubt their own memory
GaslighterInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Gaslighter, you do different actions through your kill button every round.<size=80%>

Round 1: Normal kills
Round 2: Knight players
Round 3: Curse players (like Witch)
Round 4: Shield players

</size><size=90%>Then the cycle repeats, or you stay on normally killing until the end of the game depending on the settings.
Settings determine your win condition.</size>
TechnicianInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Technician, you must fix a certain number of sabotages to win. Depending on settings, you may be a able to vent, and you may win alone or with the winning team if your objective is completed. You may get fewer or more points for certain sabotages.
SpeedrunnerInfo: 如果你完成了任务那么你就迎来了你的曙光！
SpeedrunnerInfoLong: (船员职业):\n当你完成所有任务(并且你仍然活着)时,游戏立即结束,船员阵营获胜.
SpeedrunnerNotifyKillers: 任务即将完成时通知内鬼
SpeedrunnerNotifyAtXTasksLeft: 通知内鬼剩下的任务数量
LookoutInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Lookout, you can see the IDs of every player at all times. This allows you to see through shapeshifts and camouflages.
WitnessInfo: Find out if someone killed recently
WitnessInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nWhen you use your kill button on someone, it tells you if the player killed recently or not. The yellow exclamation mark means they've killed, and the green chech mark means they've not.
WitnessTime: Max Time after killing where killer appears red
DeadlyQuotaInfo: You don't win if you didn't kill enough
DeadlyQuotaInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nDeadly Quota is an add-on that only impostors can get. The holder of this add-on will need to get a specified amount of kills (or more) to be able to win. If their win condition triggers before getting a required amount of kills, the player loses even if they were supposed to win.
CircumventInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nCircumvent is an add-on that only impostors can get. The holder of this add-on will not be able to use vents (or only limited times per game or round).
DamoclesInfoLong: (Add-ons): Damocles is an add-on that only impostors can get. The holder of this add-on will constantly have a timer displayed next to their role name. If the timer expires, the holder dies. The timer stops during meetings. Below is a list of what increases your time and what lowers your suicide timer: [+] You, or another impostor or madmate kills [+] Entering a vent you didn't enter this round yet [+] Surviving a meeting [+] A player not on your team gets ejected [-] Fixing a sabotage [-] An impostor or a madmate dies [-] Reporting a dead body or calling a meeting [-] A player on your team gets ejected
StressedInfoLong: (Add-ons): Stressed is an add-on that only crewmates with tasks can get. The holder of this add-on will constantly have a timer displayed next to their role name. If the timer expires, the holder dies. The timer stops during meetings. Below is a list of what increases your time and what lowers your suicide timer: [+] Completing a task [+] A non-crewmate player dies [+] Surviving a meeting [+] A non-crewmate player gets ejected [+] Fixing a sabotage [+] Reporting a dead body or calling a meeting [-] A crewmate gets ejected

Commands.ChangeSettingHelp: 参数: -map(地图)(theskeld/mirahq/polus/dlekseht/airship/thefungle/自定义) -impostors(内鬼) (数量X个) -players(玩家)(数量X个) -recommended(推荐)(开启/关闭) -confirmejects(确认驱逐)(开启/关闭) -emergencymeetings(紧急会议按钮(次数)) -anonymousvotes(匿名投票)(开启/关闭) -emergencycooldown(紧急按钮cd(X)) -discussiontime(讨论时间)(X) -votingtime(投票时间)(X) -playerspeed(玩家速度)(X.X) -crewmatevision船员视野(X.X) -内鬼视野(X.X) -击杀冷却(X.X) -击杀距离(短/中/长/自定义) -任务更新频度(会议/实时/永不/自定义) -可视化任务(开启/关闭) -普通任务(X个) -长任务(X个) -短任务(X个) -科学家数量(X个) -科学家机率(X%) -生命仪器CD(X.X) -生命仪器持续时间(X.X) -工程师数量(X个) -工程师机率(X%) 剩下几个职业以此类推 注意! 1:大小写问题 2.当你选择自定义时需要在后面写明你的参数 3.X.X只能为单精度浮点数例如8.9 4.如果你设置了“鬼魂做任务”，则会导致问题 使用样例: /cs map fungle /cs phantomchance(隐身人机率) 20% /cs trackdelay(追踪者的追踪延时) 1,7 对这些设置选项名字不理解?试试把AU语言切换为英语再打开职业页面看看!

LoadingHint.0:
Did you know?
You can put roles of your choice into custom teams!
View instructions on our website (link on main menu)!
LoadingHint.1:
Did you know?
You can force or ban certain role and add-on combos using /combo in lobby!
Give it a try after this game!
LoadingHint.2:
Did you know?
You can change roles', add-ons', settings', etc. names using custom translation files!
LoadingHint.3:
Did you know?
You can play our beta releases / test versions!
Join our Discord server to download them (link on main menu)!
LoadingHint.4:
Found a bug?
Report it to our Discord server (link on main menu)!
We'll fix it as soon as possible!
LoadingHint.5:
Have an idea you would like to see in the mod?
Post your suggestion in our Discord server (link on main menu)!
We'll consider it for future updates!
LoadingHint.6:
Did you know?
You can activate the ban-list to permanently ban players using their friend code!
LoadingHint.7:
Did you know?
You can add or remove moderators directly in the game by using /addmod and /deletemod!
LoadingHint.8:
Did you know?
Hackers usually don't have a friend code, so you can easily enable the protect in System Settings!
LoadingHint.9:
Did you know?
You can quickly change game settings without opening the menu using /changesetting (/cs)!
Example: /cs map polus
LoadingHint.10:
Did you know?
You can customize your lobby tag using custom translation files!
LoadingHint.11:
Did you know?
You can set your role for the next game using /setrole as the host!
LoadingHint.12:
Confused about your death? Don't know who killed you?
Use /death or /d after you die!
LoadingHint.13:
Role text covering up names in meetings?
Use /xf!
LoadingHint.14:
Bored of waiting in lobby or after dying early?
Use /gno to play a simple Guess The Number minigame to speed up time!
LoadingHint.15:
Black screened after a meeting?
Try pressing CTRL + SHIFT + X to fix it!
LoadingHint.16:
Don't know what your role or add-on does?
Press F1 instead of typing commands!
LoadingHint.17:
Did you know?
You can quickly enable/disable roles by typing /os {percentage} {role}!
(This will set the spawn chance of the role to the specified percentage)
LoadingHint.18:
Edited the translation file but don't want to restart the game just to apply the changes?
Press F5 + T!
LoadingHint.19:
Chat icon not appearing?
Press SHIFT + C + ENTER to fix it!
LoadingHint.20:
Did you know?
You can instantly start the game without waiting for the 5 seconds countdown by pressing SHIFT!
LoadingHint.21:
Did you know?
You can cancel the starting countdown using the Cancel button or by pressing C!
LoadingHint.22:
Did you know?
You can reset all settings to their default values by pressing CTRL + SHIFT + DELETE!
LoadingHint.23:
Did you know?
You can make yourself suicide by pressing SHIFT + E + ENTER!
LoadingHint.24:
Did you know?
Not even the most experienced EHR hosts know all of these facts about the mod they're getting told in these tips!
LoadingHint.25:
Meeting not ending when everyone voted?
Press F6 to end the meeting while also counting the votes!
LoadingHint.26:
Do you have a friend who thinks they understand everything, and you want to prove them wrong?
Turn on the Chemist role and see their reaction!
LoadingHint.27:
The Dev's favorite roles are:
Echo, Penguin, Rift Maker, Bubble, Evolver, Rogue, Vengeance....
and basically all crewmate roles :D
LoadingHint.28:
你知道吗？
EHR有9种不同的游戏模式！快去试试吧！
使用设置菜单左上角巨大标题旁边的⇄按钮切换游戏模式！
LoadingHint.29:
你知道吗？
EHR为专业游戏玩家提供了一种独特的游戏模式，叫做“漫步与驻足”！
这轮游戏后开把试试吧！
LoadingHint.30:
Getting Crewmate over and over again? Didn't get to kill for the last half an hour?
Unleash your bloodthirst in our Free For All game mode!
LoadingHint.31:
你知道吗？
EHR自带的躲猫猫模式拥有10多个额外的职业！欢迎你来玩哦！
LoadingHint.32:
你是烫手山芋的高手吗？
把你的高超技术在烫手山芋模式中展示给你的朋友！
LoadingHint.33:
你是大厅里最快的做任务的人或是杀手吗？
那么我们为你制作了一个特殊的游戏模式！
在这轮游戏后尝试“争分夺秒”吧！
LoadingHint.34:
你喜欢史蒂夫这个角色及其机制吗？
如果我们告诉你，有一种游戏模式，每个人都是史蒂夫，叫做角逐竞技，那会怎么样？
这轮游戏后开一把试一试吧！
LoadingHint.35:
Did you know?
CTRL + F1 allows you to dump the game's logs at anytime!
LoadingHint.36:
Did you know?
You can use pets to trigger abilites!
Just turn on the setting in Game Modifiers!
LoadingHint.37:
Did you know?
You can make everyone be able to vent!
Just turn on the setting in Game Modifiers!
LoadingHint.38:
Did you know?
You can disable specific tasks in Game Modifiers!
LoadingHint.39:
Did you know?
You can change the zipline travel duration on The Fungle in Mod Settings!
LoadingHint.40:
Did you know?
I bet you didn't
LoadingHint.41:
Did you know?
'at least' is 2 words, not 1
LoadingHint.43: Did you know that you can't know everything?
LoadingHint.44:
Did you know?
The Dev's favorite number is 44
LoadingHint.45:
Did you know that you can use the yield statement in an iterator to provide the next value or signal the end of an iteration in a loop since async doesn't work in BepInEx?
Yeah, me neither

WaspInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Wasp, you can sting players by using your kill button on them. If the player has a kill button they will die after a few seconds. Otherwise, they will have a ◀ next to their name in the next meeting. They will die after the meeting if the wasp isn't ejected.

When someone tries to kill you, you may evade the kill based on the host's settings. If so, 2 things can happen:
1. You become aggressive and go into swarm mode with no kill cooldown for some time.
2. You get pest controlled. This will daze you, Stunting your vision, speed and ability to sting for some time.
Note: If you evade a kill, you cannot evade kills, sabotage or vent for the rest of that round.
Wasp.SwarmModeSuffix: <#ffff00>You've been attacked and entered swarm mode for {0} seconds!</color>
SwapsterInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Swapster, you can select 2 players using your shapeshift menu to swap them.
KidnapperInfo: TP Players to you by shifting into them
KidnapperInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Kidnapper, when you shapeshift into someone, they teleport to you.
KamikazeInfo: Mark Players That Die With You
KamikazeInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Kamikaze, you can mark players by clicking your kill button once on them. When you die, all players that you marked will also die. You can kill normally by double clicking your kill button on someone.
RandomizerInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
This is basically a full chaotic role. Random events happen to you or to every player every X seconds. These effects can range from anything like super speed, through inverted controls and sniper shots all the way to time bombs and complete blindness.

Have fun!
- The Dev
RandomizerNotifyOpt: Notify When RNG Event Happens (turn off if events are frequent)
MarshallCanBeGuessedOnTaskCompletion: 完成任务的展现者可以被赌注
DoesntSpawnOnFungle: Doesn't Spawn When the Map is <color=#ffa646>Fungle</color>
BlackmailerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Blackmailer, you can blackmail players by clicking your kill button once on them. Blackmailed players' votes will be forced to be the same as your vote. Double click to kill normally.
DumpLogAfterGameEnd: Dump Log After Each Game End (Recommended)
DGResetTimer: If Resetting Skin by Timer, Reset Skin After
JailorInfo: Lock up your target in Jail
JailorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Jailor, use your kill button to lock a player in jail. Jailed players cannot be guessed or judged and jailed players can only guess Jailor.
JailorTargetAlreadySelected: You have already selected a target
CantGuessJailed: You can not guess the target
JailedCanOnlyGuessJailor: You have been jailed. You can only guess Jailor.
CanNotTrialJailed: You can not trial the target.
CanNotTrialProtected: You can not trial protected players.
notifyJailedOnMeeting: Notify Jailed player when meeting starts
JailedNotifyMsg: You have been locked up in Jail by the Jailor. No one can guess or judge you and you can only guess Jailor.\n\nIf Jailor votes you, you will be executed after the meeting ends.
CarInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Car, you can drive around the map. Everyone sees you as a car, including yourself. When you touch someone, you propel them far away in the direction you were driving. This role has absolutely no purpose other than to have fun.
ShiftguardInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Shiftguard, when someone shapeshifts or unshifts, you will be notified
InsightInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Insight, every time you complete a task, you'll know a random role that someone has in the current game.
You cannot get the same player's role twice.
You must remember the roles you know, as you cannot check them after!
TunnelerInfo: Mark a position and TP back there
TunnelerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Tunneler, you may mark a position by petting, and then you can teleport back to the marked position by petting again.
DetourInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nAs the Detour, all kill button related actions on you will be blocked and instead happen on the closest player to you.
MonitorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Telecommunication, you are notified when anyone uses cameras, vitals, doorlogs, or admin.
WerewolfInfo: Vent to Rampage to kill quickly
WerewolfInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Werewolf, you can go on a rampage by entering a vent. While you're rampaging you have a very short kill cooldown. You cannot kill when you aren't rampaging. Rampaging has a cooldown and a limited duration.
WWCanRampageUnshift: Press Unshift (shapeshift button) to begin Rampaging
YinYangerInfo: Make 2 players meet each other to kill them!
YinYangerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Yin Yanger, you may yin yang two players after each meeting. After marking the two players, you can kill normally. When the two yin yanged players go within kill distance of each other, they both suicide.
DuellistInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Duellist, you can shapeshift into someone to teleport them and you next to each other outside the map. You will both be there until one of you die.
SwiftclawInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Swiftclaw, you can pet to dash, which makes you go faster for a set amount of seconds.
CantankerousInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Cantankerous, you can only kill if you have a point. You gain points if a non-impostor player gets ejected.
CantankerousPointsGainedPerEjection: Points Gained Per Non-Impostor Player Ejected
DruidInfo: Place Triggers to Know Where Everyone Is
DruidInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Druid, you may vent, and after a delay, place a trigger where you stand. If any player walks closely by your trigger, you will be notified.
Place your triggers where only impostors go, and catch them!

Note: If the setting to use pets is on, you can place triggers immediately by petting.
DruidTriggerPlaceDelayOpt: Trigger Place Delay (when not using pets)
MafiosoInfo: With Each Tier, you're more Powerful
MafiosoInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Mafioso, you gain XP by killing, sabotaging, entering a vent you haven't entered that round yet, or by seeing a player not on your team get ejected. When you have 100 XP, your tier levels up. With each tier, you get progressively more powerful:

Tier 0: Regular impostor, higher kill cooldown, short kill range
Tier 1: Long kill range, normal kill cooldown
Tier 2: Lower kill cooldown
Tier 3: Dual pistols: you have 2 separate higher kill cooldowns, if at least one of them is up, you can kill!
Tier 4: Normal kill cooldown on both pistols
Tier 5: Delayed kills
MafiosoRewardForKilling: XP Gained for Getting a Kill
MafiosoRewardForSabotaging: XP Gained for Calling a Sabotage
MafiosoRewardForVenting: XP Gained for Entering a Unique Vent
MafiosoRewardForOtherPlayerEjected: XP Gained When a Non-Impostor Player Gets Ejected
WhispererInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Whisperer, you can ask the souls of dead players for information. You'll see the souls of the players who have died (after the next meeting) and can question them by petting on them. You have to stay near the soul for a few seconds. You then get random details on the soul or the killer shown below your name.
WhispererInfo.Time: I died {0} seconds before the meeting started
HypnotistInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Hypnotist, you can prevent all players from reporting bodies by using your ability (shapeshift/pet).
Hypnotist.DoReportAfterHypnosisEnds: Process reports that were blocked during hypnosis after the hypnosis expires
BaneInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Bane, if an impostor kills you, they will lose their abilities and become a regular impostor or shapeshifter.
TransmitterInfo: TP to nearest player by doing a task
TransmitterInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Transmitter, when you complete a task, you teleport to the nearest player.
AdrenalineInfo: Be Fast Enough to Avoid Kills
AdrenalineInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Adrenaline, when you get attacked, the killing attempt gets blocked and you receive a timer. If a meeting gets called before the timer ends, you survive. Otherwise, you die when the timer ends.

Depending on the settings, you may or may not know be able to call emergency meetings during the timer.
Adrenaline.Time: Time for a Meeting to Start
Adrenaline.MinTasksRequired: Minimum Tasks Required to Survive an Attack
Adrenaline.CanCallMeetingDuringTimer: Can Call Emergency Meetings During the Timer
Adrenaline.Suffix: <size=80%><#ffff00>You were attacked!\nIf a meeting doesn't start before <#ffffff>{0}s</color>, you die!</color></size>
SentryInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Sentry, you can monitor a room by petting. When you pet in the future, you get information from that room, including:<size=80%>
- The players currently in that room
- Who is dead in that room (if any)</size>
You also get a notification when someone uses a vent or shapeshifts in that room.

Depending on the settings, players may know if a room is monitored, and you may not be able to view this info during Comms Sabotages.
Sentry.PlayersKnowAboutCamera: Players Know if the Room is Monitored
Sentry.CannotSeeInfoDuringComms: Cannot See Info During Comms Sabotages
Sentry.Notify.Shapeshifted: {0} shapeshifted into {1} in your monitored room
Sentry.Notify.InvalidRoom: You are not in a room
Sentry.UsableDevicesForInfoView: Devices Players Can Use to Get Info About Monitored Room
Sentry.AdditionalDevicesForInfoView: Map-Specific Devices Players Can Use to Get Info About Monitored Room
DynamoInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Dynamo, you get faster by walking. The longer you walk, the faster you get. Stopping will reset your speed.
SamuraiInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Samurai, you can do delayed kills and normal kills. What decides? Well, if you click your kill button on someone (the kill won't occur immediately) and you stay near them for a few seconds (like an arsonist douse), you get a lower kill cooldown and the kill will be delayed. If you fail to stay near them, you do a normal kill, lunge included.
OverheatInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Overheat, your kill cooldown is based on your temperature. The more you wat, the hotter you get, and the lower your kill cooldown becomes, but your chance of overheating is also increasing. You can shapeshift or pet to cool down to reset your temperature. This freezes you in place for a few seconds.
Overheat.KCDDecreasePerIncreasedTemperat: Kill Cooldown Decrease per Increased Temperature
QuizMasterInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Quiz Master, you can ask questions to players. If they answer correctly, nothing happens. If they answer incorrectly, they die.

Kill everyone to win!

<u>Notes:</u>
- The Quiz Master gets sent a copy of the question message sent to their target
- The Quiz Master can single click with their kill button on someone to mark them as their target and thus ask them a question in the next meeting, or double click to kill them normally.
QuizMaster.Title: Quiz Master Question
QuizMaster.QuestionSample.Title: Quiz Master Questioned You
QuizMaster.Question.1: What was the color of the body that was last reported?
QuizMaster.Question.2: Who was the last person that pressed the button?
QuizMaster.Question.3: What was the last sabotage that was called?
QuizMaster.Question.4: What was the most recently ejected player's role?
QuizMaster.Question.5: Who reported the body in the last meeting?
QuizMaster.Question.6: How many players voted last meeting (excluding hidden/extra votes)?
QuizMaster.Question.7: How many meetings did we have so far?
QuizMaster.Question.8: Whose body was reported first in the game?
QuizMaster.Question.9: How many people pressed the emergency button so far <size=80%>(including this meeting if it's a button)</size>?
QuizMaster.Question.10: How many players died in this round?
QuizMaster.Question.11: How many players died in the first round?
QuizMaster.Question.12: How many sabotages were called so far?
QuizMaster.Question.13: How many tasks are currently completed?
QuizMaster.Question.ABC.1: What faction killed the last victim that got reported?
QuizMaster.Question.ABC.2: How did the last victim that got reported die?
QuizMaster.Question.ABC.3: Which Among Us mod has the most amount of roles?
QuizMaster.Question.ABC.4: Who is the main developer of EHR?
QuizMaster.AnswerCorrect.Self: Your target answered the question correctly. ({0})
QuizMaster.AnswerIncorrect.Self: Your target answered incorrectly. They chose {0}, while the correct option was {1}.
BargainerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Bargainer, you can gain money by killing, sabotaging and surviving meetings. You can use this money to buy some items from the shop. All devices on this map represent a shop you can use by going near it. You can buy the following items:<size=80%>
- Energy Drink (lowers your kill cooldown for that round)
- Lens Of Truth (reveals a random player's role for some time)
- Band Aid (gives you a shield for some time)</size>
When you step away from a shop, the selected item will be purchased if you have enough money for it. You can choose to not buy anything. While in the shop, sabotage to cycle between the available items.
ChemistInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Chemist, mix all sorts of chemicals to make overpowered gasses and items. Each room on the ship functions as a type of factory. In each factory, you can do some processes that take ingredients and get the results. (Some factories have multiple processes available, sabotage to cycle between them.) (You can vent to get some basic ingredients.) (Pet to complete a process if you have the required ingredients.)

Work your way to get these end products, which do the following:
- Sulfuric Acid: Mark someone with the kill button, and that player will spread the acid to all players they go nearby. After some time, all the acid players die.
- Methylamine Gas: Vent to blind everyone except you.
- Explosive: Gets put onto the next dead body you make. Everyone who tries to report it dies.
- Grenade: Put this onto someone via the kill button. They now carry the grenade. It blows up in seconds, killing that player and everyone nearby.

If you have an end product ready to use through the kill button, single click to use it, double click to kill normally.

<size=80%>By far, this is the most complex role in the history of Among Us. Good luck! (- The Dev)</size>
Chemist.Item.Explosive.Usage: Amount of Explosives Lost When Using
Chemist.Item.Grenade.Usage: Amount of Grenades Lost When Using
Chemist.Item.SulfuricAcid.Usage: Amount of Sulfuric Acid Lost When Using
Chemist.Item.MethylamineGas.Usage: Amount of Methylamine Gas Lost When Using
Chemist.AirGainedPerSecond: Amount of Air Gained Every Second
Chemist.WaterGainedPerSecond: Amount of Water Gained Every Second
Chemist.CoalGainedPerVent: Amount of Coal Gained With Venting
Chemist.IronOreGainedPerVent: Amount of Iron Ore Gained With Venting
CanKillWithDoubleClick: Can Kill with Double Click method
SchrodingersCatInfo: Get Attacked to Get a Role
SchrodingersCatInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs Schrödinger's Cat, if you get attacked, you turn into the same role as your killer. If you don't get attacked, you lose, or you can win with crewmates, depending on the settings.
SchrodingersCat.WinsWithCrewIfNotAttacke: Wins with crewmates if not attacked
SchrodingersCat.Notify.KillerRecruited: You have recruited the {1}! {0} now has the same role as you.
SchrodingersCat.Notify.RecruitedByKiller: You have been recruited by the {1}! You now have the same role as {0}.
SocialiteInfo: Know Who Interacts With Your Target
SocialiteInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Socialite, you can use your kill button to mark your target every round. When someone tries to kill your target, the kill gets blocked and they get added to your Guest List (they know about this). Players' names that are in your Guest List are shown in black. Players on the Guest List can kill your target. You can also add players to your Guest List by voting them.
CherokiousInfo: Do tasks to get Bullets to Kill
CherokiousInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Cherokious, you can get bullets by completing tasks. You can kill by petting near someone. You can only kill if you have bullets.
AutocratInfo: TP nearest player to you by doing a task
AutocratInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Autocrat, when you complete a task, you teleport the nearest player to you.
NightmareInfoLong: (船员职业):\n美梦者不能在熄灯时被杀死,他注定被美梦庇佑.
PerceiverInfo: Check How Many Killers Are Nearby
PerceiverInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Perceiver, you can vent/pet to check how many killers are near you. The radius is specified by the host.
ConvenerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Convener, you can vent/pet to teleport everyone to you.
MathematicianInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Mathematician, you can use '/ask [number] [number]' to ask a math question (What is [number] + [number]?). The first player to answer correctly will get shielded for the next round. You can only ask once per meeting.
MathematicianQuestionString: What is {0} + {1}? Type '/answer [answer]' to answer. First to answer correctly gets shielded for the next round!
MathematicianAnsweredString: {0} has answered correctly! ({1}) They will be shielded for the next round.
EscortInfo: Role-Block Players to Help the Crew!
EscortInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Escort, you can role-block a player for a specified time using your kill button. A role-blocked player cannot kill, vent, sabotage or report.\n(Role-Block duration is the same as the hack duration for The Glitch)
GauloisInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nAs the Gaulois, you can use your kill button on someone to give them a permanent speed boost.
ConsortInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Consort, you can role-block a player which prevents them from killing, venting, sabotaging and reporting for some time by clicking your kill button on them once. Double click with your kill button on them to kill them normally.\n(The role-block duraiton is the same as the hack duration for The Glitch)
DonutDeliveryInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Donut Delivery, you can deliver donuts to players by pressing your kill button on them. The donut has absolutely no effect, other than the target knowing they got a donut.
DonutDelivered-0: \nSuccess!\nThey devoured the donut like it was the last task on the ship.
DonutDelivered-1: \nDelivered with perfection!\nTheir happiness level is higher than the emergency meeting button.
DonutDelivered-2: \nIt's official:\nthe donut delivery was more satisfying than completing all tasks!
DonutDelivered-3: \nGlowing reviews!\nThe donut got more compliments than the cafeteria emergency table.
DonutDelivered-4: \nPositive vibes only!\nThey're raving about the donut like it's the 'Best Crewmate' award.
DonutDelivered-5: \nDonut delivery rated MVP – Most Valuable Pastry!
DonutDelivered-6: \nSweet success!\nThe donut hit the spot, just like an impostor's target.
DonutDelivered-7: \nVictory dance!\nThe donut delivery was smoother than venting.
DonutDelivered-8: \nSweetness level: Maximum.\nDonut delivery achieved a sweet victory!
DonutDelivered-9: \nDelivered!\nThey loved it more than a victory screen!
DonutDelivered-10: \nSuccessful drop-off!\nThe donut was a hit, not a sus move!
DonutDelivered-11: \nDonut delivered without a crumb of suspicion!
DonutDelivered-12: \nPositive feedback!\nThey said the donut was so good it was almost 'impostor-able'!
DonutDelivered-13: \nNot a fan of the flavor?\nMaybe next time, stick to venti lattes...
DonutDelivered-14: \nUnpopular opinion:\nThey didn't like the chocolate. Maybe go for sprinkles next time?
DonutDelivered-15: \nThe donut was killer, just like their alibi.
DonutDelivered-16: \nOops! Donut delivery failed.\nThey're probably more into bagels...
DonutDelivered-17: \nRejected!\nTurns out, they're on a diet. Tough crowd!
DonutDelivered-18: \nFailed delivery alert.\nLooks like they prefer impostor snacks.
DonutGot-0:
Special delivery!
You've been 'dough'nuted' by the Donut Delivery crewmate.
Enjoy the sweetness!
DonutGot-1:
Congrats!
You just got 'holey' goodness delivered by the Donut Delivery crewmate.
Treat yourself!
DonutGot-2:
Donut Delivery here!
Your order of one delicious donut has been successfully dispatched.
