Enjoy the flavor explosion!
DonutGot-3:
Surprise!
You've been visited by the Donut Delivery crewmate.
It's a killer treat!
DonutGot-4:
Ding-dong! A donut delivery is at your door.
Courtesy of the Donut Delivery crewmate.
Savor the sweetness!
DonutGot-5:
Special delivery alert!
You've just received a 'killer' donut from the Donut Delivery crewmate.
Enjoy the crime scene... I mean snack!
DonutDeliverSpeedEffect: Speed Boost For Players Who Get Donuts
RhapsodeInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Rhapsode, you can vent/pet to start singing. During this time, no one can vent or shapeshift since they're distracted by your song. (Settings may exclude Crewmates.)
ChronomancerInfo: Charge up your kill button and go ham!
ChronomancerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Chronomancer, when your kill cooldown is up, your kill button starts charging (you'll see the percentage of the charge under your name). When you make a kill, you use the charge. Depending on how much you've charged your kill button up, you'll have a 0 second kill cooldown until the charge runs out. When the charge runs out, your kill cooldown is reset.
ChargeInterval: Charge Percentage Gained Each Second When Kill Cooldown Is Up
ChargeLossInterval: Charge Percentage Lost Each Second While Killing
NullifierInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Nullifier, clicking your kill button on a player once will remove 1 ability use from them, if they have any. Double click with your kill button on someone to kill them normally.

Note: You won't know if the target had an ability use limit, but the target may notice the removal. Be careful!
VentguardInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Ventguard, you can enter vents to block them. No one can enter blocked vents, except Crewmates, if the setting is on. You will be notified if someone tries to use the vent you blocked. Blocked vents reset every meeting.
EnteredBlockedVent: <color=#ffff00>This vent is blocked by the Ventguard</color>
VentguardNotify: Someone tried to use a blocked vent
VentguardNotifyOnBlockedVentUse: Notify When Someone Tries to Use a Blocked Vent
VortexInfo: Your victims' bodies teleport to a random vent
VortexInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Vortex, when you kill someone, their body teleports to a random vent. The body will be reported in the vent.
Vortex.IfTargetCannotBeTeleported: If the target cannot be teleported to a random vent
EnigmaInfoLong: (Crewmates): As the Enigma, you get a random clue about the killer each meeting, depending on the setting, you may have to report the body to receive a clue. The more tasks you complete the preciser the clues get. Light colors: Red, Pink, Orange, Yellow, White, Cyan, Lime, Rose, Banana, Coral Dark colors: Blue, Green, Black, Purple, Brown, Maroon, Gray, Tan
EnigmaClueStage1Tasks: Number of Tasks to complete to see Stage 1 <color=#676798>Clues</color>
EnigmaClueStage2Tasks: Number of Tasks to complete to see Stage 2 <color=#676798>Clues</color>
EnigmaClueStage3Tasks: Number of Tasks to complete to see Stage 3 <color=#676798>Clues</color>
EnigmaClueGetCluesWithoutReporting: <color=#676798>Enigma</color> can get <color=#676798>Clues</color> without reporting a dead body
EnigmaClueHat2: The Killer does not wear a Hat!
EnigmaClueHat3: The Killer wears {0} as a Hat!
EnigmaClueSkin2: The Killer does not wear a Skin!
EnigmaClueSkin3: The Killer wears {0} as a Skin!
EnigmaClueVisor2: The Killer does not wear a Visor!
EnigmaClueVisor3: The Killer wears {0} as a Visor!
EnigmaCluePet1: The Killer does have a Pet!
EnigmaCluePet2: The Killer does not have a Pet!
EnigmaCluePet3: The Killer has {0} as a Pet!
EnigmaClueName1: The Name of the Killer contains the letter {0} or the letter {1}!
EnigmaClueName2: The Name of the Killer contains the letter {0}!
EnigmaClueName3: The Name of the Killer contains the letter {0} and the letter {1}!
EnigmaClueNameLength1: The Name of the Killer has a Length between {0} and {1} letters!
EnigmaClueNameLength2: The Name of the Killer has a Length of {0} letters!
EnigmaClueColor1: The Killer has a light color!
EnigmaClueColor2: The Killer has a dark color!
EnigmaClueLocation: The Last Room the Killer was in is {0}!
EnigmaClueStatus1: The Killer is currently inside a Vent!
EnigmaClueStatus2: The Killer is currently on a Ladder!
EnigmaClueLevel3: The Killer's Level is between {0} and {1}!
ZombieSpeedReduceInterval: 僵尸每次减速的时间间隔
GuesserSuicides: Guessers Suicide When Trying to Guess Players With <#BAAAE9>Onbound</color>
PlagueDoctorInfoLong: (Neutrals) (Plague Doctor from TOH):\nThe Plague Doctor's goal is to infect every living player. They start by choosing one player to infect, after which anyone who spends a set amount of time in range of the infected player becomes infected themselves. Infection progress is cumulative, and does not reset with distance or after meetings.
LovingCrewmateInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Lover, your goal is to stay alive until the end of the game and help your lover win. If your lover dies, you will die as well.
LovingImpostorInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Loving Impostor, your goal is to stay alive until the end of the game and help your lover win. If your lover dies, you will die as well. However, you're also an impostor! You can win either way, but you must keep your lover alive.
EndermanInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Enderman, you can sabotage/pet to mark the position where you're currently standing. You'll teleport back to that position after a specified amount of time.
MycologistInfo: Spread Spores and Kill Infected Players
MycologistInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Mycologist, you can infect players around you by entering a vent/sabotaging/petting. You can only kill the ones you've infected.
BubbleInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Bubble, you may encase a player by using your kill button on them. They will explode in a specified time killing everyone nearby. Depending on the settings, others may see the encased player with a pink name after a certain amount of time.
BubbleDiesIfInRange: Bubble Dies If In Range Of Explosion
HookshotInfo: Pull Players or TP to them
HookshotInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Hookshot, you may mark a target by clicking on your target once. Double click to kill them normally. Vent to switch between the 2 teleporting modes: Teleport Target to You / You Teleport to Target. Sabotage/Pet to execute the current selected action mode after marking a target.
SprayerInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Sprayer, you can place traps by sabotaging/petting. If someone walks into a trap, they'll have lower speed and vision for some time. If a player walks into a trap a specified amount of times, they suicide.
SprayerMaxTrappedTimes: Times a Player Has to Walk Into a Trap to Die
ElectricInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Electric, when you complete a task, a random killer gets frozen for a few seconds.
MoleInfo: TP to Random Vents by Entering One
MoleInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Mole, when you vent, you get kicked out and teleport to a random vent on the map. / Pet to teleport to a random vent.
TornadoInfoLong: (船员职业):\n作为呼风唤雨之人,你可以通过抚摸宠物来生成龙卷风.当有人靠近龙卷风时,他们会被传送到地图内的随机地点.
TeleportedByTornado: \n哦谢！你被龙卷风载到了一个随机的地方，\n感谢龙卷风赠与你的这次免费旅行吧！
DeadlinedInfo: Must do a task or use kill button each round
DeadlinedInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Deadlined, you must complete a task or kill someone each round. If you fail to do so, you will die. If a meeting gets called too soon after the previous one ends (time set by the host), you won't die. This doesn't apply on the first round.
Deadlined.MustDoTask: <size=80%><#ffa500>You must complete a task or kill before the next meeting</color></size>
AssumerInfoLong: (Impostors): As the Assumer, you can type /assume {id} {number} to assume that the selected player (whose ID you typed as the first argument, replacing '{id}') will get exactly {number} votes (the number you typed in the second argument, replacing '{number}'). Example: /assume 0 3 (assume that the host gets 3 votes). If you are correct, every player that voted for your target dies.
Assumer.AssumedMessage: You're assuming that {0} will receive {1} votes
Assumer.VoteReceiverDies: Vote Receiver Dies on Correct Assumption
Assumer.MinPlayersToAssume: Minimum Alive Players to Make Assumptions
SentinelInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Sentinel, you may vent to start patrolling your surrounding area. When you do, all killers within this area are notified to dip. If any killer attempts to kill someone within this area while you're patrolling, you'll kill them instead. When patrolling is over, all killers in the patrolling area suicide. While patrolling, you have lower vision.
KillerNotifyPatrol: <#ffff00>You are in the patrolling radius!\nYou have <#ffa500>{0}s</color> to move out or you'll die!</color>
PenguinInfoLong: (Impostors):\nPenguins can restrain target by pressing the kill button, and drag around. While dragging, the target dies by pressing the kill button again or after a certain period of time. Press the kill button twice for a direct kill.
PenguinMeetingKill: Kill the target if a meeting starts during dragging.
PenguinVictimCanUseAbilities: Victim Can Use Their Abilities While Being Dragged
StealthInfo: Killing Blinds Everyone in the Room
StealthInfoLong: (Impostors):\nWhen the Stealth kills, players in the same room are blinded for a short time.
AnalystInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Analyst, you may use your kill button on someone to analyze them. You will have to stand next to your target for a few seconds to complete the analysis. When the analysis is complete, you will see how many players they've killed so far, how many times they've vented so far, and their role basis.

Note: If the host's settings don't allow you to see an information, the result will show 0 or nothing!
Note: None of these factors determine whether someone is evil or not! Think twice before judging too fast!
AnalyzerResult:
Showing analyzation result for <color=#00ffa5>{0}</color>:
Kills: <color=#ff1919>{1}</color>, Vents: <color=#ffa500>{2}</color>, Role Basis: <color=#00ffff>{3}</color>
DrainerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Drainer, entering a vent will kill all players inside that vent and all connecting vents.
CameraManInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Camera Man, you can vent/pet to instantly teleport to the security room.
TPBackWhenMoveAway: Teleport Back When Moving Away From Cameras
EchoInfo: Make Players Die Where You Want
EchoInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Echo, you can shapeshift into a player to swap locations and skins with them. During the shapeshift, your target cannot move. When you unshift, the swap reverts and the target dies exactly where you were.

You cannot kill normally.
NiceHackerInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
This role is different for modded clients and vanilla clients.

As a modded client, whenever you open the map (and have ability uses left), the admin map will show up. You may be able to move while having the map open depending on settings.

As a vanilla client, you may enter a vent/pet to get a notification saying how many people are in different rooms on the ship (essentially admin map).
NiceHackerModdedClientAbilityUseSecondsM: Modded clients, for 1 ability use, can view Admin map for
NiceHackerModdedClientCanMoveWhileViewin: Modded clients can move while looking at Admin map
NiceHackerVanillaClientSeesInfoFor: Vanilla clients see admin info notify for
VengeanceInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Vengeance, you win when you're the last one standing. Additionally, when someone tries to kill you, the kill will be blocked and you will be teleported to a random vent. You will have a limited time to kill your killer. If you succeed to do so, you live. If the time runs out before you kill your killer, you die permanently. If you try to kill someone else other than your killer, you will die.
VengeanceRevenge: You have {0}s to kill your killer
HeadHunterInfo: Kill your target for low cooldown
HeadHunterInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Head Hunter, you have 3 targets that reset every meeting. If you kill one of your targets, your kill cooldown decreases by the set amount permanently. If you kill someone else other than any of your targets, your kill cooldown permanently increases by the set amount. You see your targets with a black name.
HHSuccessKCDDecrease: Kill Cooldown Decrease on killing target
HHFailureKCDIncrease: Kill Cooldown Increase on killing others
RabbitInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Rabbit, each time you complete a task, you see an arrow pointing towards a random impostor for 5 seconds.\nNote: This ability may only activate after you've completed a set number of tasks.
RabbitMinTasks: Minimum Number of Tasks Completed to Activate Ability
PyromaniacInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Pyromaniac, your job is to kill everyone and be the last one standing. Your special ability is that you can douse players. Whenever you kill a doused player, your kill cooldown will be very short.
PyroBurnCooldown: Kill Cooldown after killing a Doused Player
WeaponMasterInfo: Use your weapons to kill everyone
WeaponMasterInfoLong:
(Neutral):
As the Weapon Master, you can cycle between your weapons by petting/calling a sabotage.

The Sword weapon is a normal kill method.

The Axe weapon kills everyone in a certain radius when you make a kill. You have a higher kill cooldown while using this weapon.

The Lance weapon sets your kill range to the maximum, and you don't lunge toward your kills. You can't vent while using this weapon.

While using your Shield, you can survive an attack once. You can't kill while using your shield.
OverrideScientistBasedRoles: 同时将基于科学家的角色覆盖为工程师
SpawnAdditionalRefugeeOnImpsDead: 当所有<#ff1919>内鬼</color>死亡时随机一个<#8cffff>船员</color>变为<#ff1919>流亡者</color>
SpawnAdditionalRefugeeWhenNKAlive: 当<#ffab1b>邪恶中立</color>活着时也生成流亡者
SpawnAdditionalRefugeeMinAlivePlayers: 生成流亡者所需最小存活玩家数
PetsForceEnabled: “争分夺秒”游戏模式需要启用宠物，因此它们被强制开启。您可以在（游戏修改器）这个选项卡下为之后的游戏禁用它。
CustomTeamHelp: You are in the {0}! ({1})\nWork with your team members to win together!
NoPetActionMsg3: You start wondering whether you are sus or not
NoPetActionMsg4: 也许你在练习你的破案能力？
NoPetActionMsg5: You contemplate the meaning of life for a moment.
NoPetActionMsg6: You try to teach your pet the art of stealth.
NoPetActionMsg7: You attempt to have a deep conversation with your pet about the mysteries of the spaceship.
NoPetActionMsg8: You rehearse your emergency meeting speech in your head.
NoPetActionMsg9: You realize you left the space oven on in the cafeteria.
NoPetActionMsg10: You practice your emergency venting technique, just in case.
NoPetActionMsg11: You perform a quick dance move to entertain your pet.
NoPetActionMsg12: You start a one-person conga line around the reactor.
NoPetActionMsg13: You mime fixing a non-existent spaceship engine.
NoPetActionMsgImp1: You are an Impostor, but you probably know that
NoPetActionMsgImp2: You debate whether space pizza or space burgers would make a better crewmate meal.
NoPetActionMsgCrewWithTasksLeft: You realize you still have tasks to do
NoPetActionMsgCrew: You imagine yourself as the impostor in a parallel universe.
NoPetActionMsgNeutral1: You imagine yourself as the impostor in a parallel universe.
NoPetActionMsgNeutral2: You question yourself how did you get here
UniqueNeutralRevealScreen: Each <#ffab1b>Neutral</color> Role Has Its Own Reveal Screen
EclipseInfo: Your vision increases with each kill you get
EclipseInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Eclipse, your job is to kill everyone and be the last one standing to win. You start with a low vision, and with each kill you get, it slowly increases.
EclipseVisionIncrease: Increase Vision per each kill by
MastermindInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Mastermind, you can use your kill button on a player once to manipulate them. They'll be told after a delay that they were manipulated and they must kill someone within a limited time to survive. If the time limit expires or a meeting gets called before killing someone, they die.\nDouble click on someone to kill them normally.
MastermindTimeLimit: Time Limit to Kill Someone / Complete a Task
ManipulateNotify: \n<color=#ff1919>You were manipulated by the Mastermind!</color>\n<color=#ffff00>You must kill someone within <color=#ffa500>{0}s</color> or you die!</color>
ManipulatedKilled: The player you manipulated has killed / completed a task
GamblerInfo: Each Kill gets you an Effect
GamblerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Gambler, a random event happens after each kill you get. These effects can be anywhere between a self-report and an extra sniper shot.
GamblerWhatToIgnore: What to Ignore when the Unstoppable effect is applied
PatrollerInfo: Have Different Boosts in Each Room
PatrollerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Patroller, you have different boosts in each room. At the start of the game, it gets randomly rolled which boosts you get in which room. Additionally, you can vent freely from any room once per round.

Kill everyone to win!
You can see your boosts by petting if the setting to use them is on.
PatrollerNotifyNoBoost: You are now in <color=#00ffa5>{0}</color>\nIn this room, you have <#ff0000>no boosts</color>
PatrollerNotify: You are now in <color=#00ffa5>{0}</color>\nIn this room, {1}
HitmanInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Hitman, you may shapeshift into someone to mark them as your target. If you kill your target, your next kill cooldown will be lower.

Note: Once you chose a target, you cannot change it. You'll get a chance to mark a target again after killing your current target.
SapperInfo: Blow up Everyone with Timed Bombs!
SapperInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Sapper, you can not kill with your kill button. Instead, you can pet/shapeshift to plant time bombs which explode after a specified delay (set by host), killing everyone nearby.

Note: If you're in the radius of the explosion, you will die too!
RiftMakerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Rift Maker, you may shapeshift twice/pet twice to mark two points on the ship. After you've marked both places, whenever you go near a marked place, you will automatically teleport to the other mark point.
Venting discards both marked places.

You cannot vent normally.
IncorrectMarks: \n<color=#ffff00>Your 2 marks are too close to each other, they won't work</color>\nYour marks were discarded.
MagicianInfoLong:
(Neutral):
As the Magician, you get a card after each kill you make. Whenever you get a card, a message will appear with its description and effect.

To play a card, call any sabotage (not doors) (the sabotage won't actually be called), or use the Pet button if the setting is on.
MagicianLowKCD: Kill Cooldown when using Overlocking Device
Magician-GetIdToDesc-1: Slows down everyone nearby for some time.
Magician-GetIdToDesc-3: Teleports you to a random vent.
Magician-GetIdToDesc-4: Use twice to mark 2 positions. Going near a marked position teleports you to the other.
Magician-GetIdToDesc-6: Blinds everyone nearby for some time.
Magician-GetIdToDesc-7: Place a time bomb. When it explodes, it kills everyone nearby.
Magician-GetIdToDesc-8: Increases your speed for some time.
Magician-GetIdToDesc-10: See how many players are in each room.
NecromancerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nThe Necromancer is the main recruiter for the Undead faction. The first person it kills will become a Deathknight. With the help of the Deathknight, they must work together to convert others to the Undead. If the Necromancer were to die, The Deathknight would turn into Necromancer.
DeathknightInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nThe Deathknight must help the Necromancer convert players to the Undead. By using your pet button by someone who the Necromancer had used their kill button on, they will be converted. There can only be one Deathknight at a time, and if the Necromancer dies, the Deathknight will be the new Necromancer.
RecruitedByDeathknight: You've been recruited to the Undead faction!
DeathknightRecruitedPlayer: Successfully recruited player to the Undead faction!
RecruitedToDeathknight: The Necromancer recruited you to be their Deathknight!
ImpartialInfo: Kill Specified Number of Players in Each Team
ImpartialInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Impartial, you must kill a specified number of players from each team to win. You can see how many players you need to kill from each team next to your role name.
ImpartialCanWinWhenKillingMore: Can Win Even When Killing More of a Team than the Maximum
SoulHunterInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Soul Hunter, you can mark your target via your kill button. In the next meeting, you'll be frozen for a set amount of seconds and your target will be notified about being your target. Your target will not be able to vent, call a meeting or kill you. You must kill your target within a specified number of seconds, else you lose a soul. If you kill your target in time, you gain a soul. Collect a set amount of souls to satisfy your win condition. If your win condition is satisfied at the end of the game, you'll win with the winning team.
SoulHunterNumOfSoulsToWin: Number of Souls Required to Win
SoulHunterGetSoulForSuicide: Gain Soul When Target Dies By Other Means
SoulHunterTargetNotify: The <color=#3f2c61>Soul Hunter</color>, <color=#00ffa5>{0}</color> is hunting you. Hide!
SoulHunterTargetNotifyNoMeeting: <color=#ffff00>You cannot call emergency meetings while being hunted</color>
SoulHunterTargetNotifyNoKill: <color=#ffff00>You cannot kill the <color=#3f2c61>Soul Hunter</color> while being hunted</color>
BeaconInfo: Increase Nearby Players' Vision During Lights
BeaconInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Beacon, during the lights sabotage, you increase the vision of players around you.
BeaconVisionIncrease: Increased Vision for Affected Players During Lights Sabotage
LibrarianInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Librarian, when you're in silencing mode, if someone reports a body next to you, you'll kill them instead. After you kill someone like this, everyone will see 'SSSH!' in red under your name.
UsesPetInsteadOfKillNotice: <#ffff00>⚠ As this role, you need to use your pet button as your kill button!</color>
FramerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Framer, single click with your kill button on someone to frame them, making the game think they're on the impostor team. Double click to kill normally.
Framer.TargetFramedNotify: The game now thinks {0} is an <#ff1919>impostor</color>
BackstabberInfo: Stab a Team in the Back
BackstabberInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Backstabber, you can optionally kill 1 player. If you don't kill anyone, you will win with the crewmates. If you kill an Impostor or a Madmate, you will win with the winning Neutral Killer. If you kill anyone other than an Impostor or a Madmate, you will win with the Impostors.
Backstabber.MurderNotify: Your kill target was {0}\nThis means, you'll win with {1}
GuessBackstabber: You cannot guess a revealed Backstabber.
PostmanInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Postman, your job is to deliver mail to everyone. You'll always have a target, and you need to click your kill button on that target to deliver the mail to them. When you've delivered mail to everyone, your win condition is satisfied. You'll win with the winning team, no matter what happens.
PostmanDiesWhenTargetDies: <color=#00b893>Postman</color> dies when the current target dies
PostmanDone:
<color=#00ff00>You're done delivering messages!
You'll win with the winning team at the end.</color>
RecklessInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Reckless, your cooldown decreases with each kill you get. However, this isn't permanent. Your kill cooldown resets back to its default value at every meeting.
IgnitorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Ignitor, you can light a new candle by completing a task, which sets your vision to maximum. As time goes on and the candle burns down, your vision progressively gets smaller. Since you use candles, you're immune to the Lights Sabotage.
AltruistInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Altruist, you can revive a dead player by reporting their body. The revived player will be able to continue playing as if they were never dead. If you revive a player, you will die.\nYou can switch between reviving and reporting modes by entering a vent/petting.
AltruistKillerAlert: <#ffff00><size=150%>A player you killed was revived by the <color=#300000>Altruist</color>!</size></color>
Altruist.ReviveTargetCanReportTheirOwnBo: Revived players can report their own dead body
Altruist.ReviveTargetsKillerGetsAlert: The killer of the revived player gets an alert about the revival
Altruist.ReviveTargetsKillerGetsArrow: The killer also gets an arrow towards the revived player
AdventurerInfoLong: (Crewmates): As the Adventurer, you can collect resources listed below and craft them into weapons if you have the required amount of materials for it. Resources (and how to obtain them): - ❖ (Complete a Task) - Θ (Players Leave This Behind*) - ♳ (Dead Bodies*) - ⁂ (Shapeshift Skins*) - ☀ (Fix Lights) - ○ (Found in Groups*) * When this resource is available somewhere, you get an arrow pointing towards that location. (Except dead bodies.) Go there to collect it. Weapons (and their ingredients): - Gun (1 ♳ + 1 ❖) (Kill nearest player) - Shield (3 ❖) (Gives nearest player a 1-time shield) - Lantern (1 ☀ + 1 ❖) (Increases crewmates' vision for some time) - Portal (2 Θ) (Swaps you with a random player) - Wrench (1 ☀ + 2 ❖) (Clears the current sabotage) - Proxy (2 ○ + 1 ❖) (Gives you +1 vote in the next meeting) - Prediction (1 ♳ + 2 ⁂ + 1 ❖) (Reveals the nearest player's role) - RNG (2 Θ + 2 ❖) (Makes a random weapon) To use your weapons, pet.
AdventurerWeaponDescription.Gun: Kill the next player you go near
AdventurerWeaponDescription.Lantern: Increases crewmates' vision for some time
AdventurerWeaponDescription.Portal: Swaps you with a random player
AdventurerWeaponDescription.Proxy: Gives you +1 vote in the next meeting
AdventurerIngredientsDisplay: {0}: {1}\nVent to craft this weapon / Pet to cycle to next weapon
ChefInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Chef, you can cook meals for everyone by completing tasks. If a crewmate gets a meal, they'll get a random boost (speed, vision, shield). If an impostor or a neutral killer gets a meal, it will be rotten and they have to spit it out by venting or killing in a specified amount of time or they'll get blinded and frozen for some time.
Chef.RottenTime: Time to Spit Out Rotten Food
ChefNotify: The <#d6d6ff>Chef</color> got you some {0}!\nThis caused you to have <#ffff00>{1}</color>
ImitatorInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Imitator, your kill cooldown is different after every even numbered kill and every odd numbered kill of yours. You have a separate cooldown after meetings. Your first kill after every meeting will set your cooldown to the Even-Numbered Kill Cooldown, your second kill will set it to the Odd-Numbered Kill Cooldown, and the process repeats until a meeting is called again.
ExpressInfo: You get a speed boost on completing a task
ExpressInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Express, you gain a small temporary speed boost after each task you complete.
NiceSwapperInfoLong: (Crewmates): As the Swapper, you can use the command /sw [ID] twice to choose 2 players. Those votes received by those 2 players will be swapped. You can see everyone's IDs next to their name. For example, if 3 players voted red, and 5 players voted yellow, and you swap red and yellows' IDs, then red will receive 5 votes, and yellow will receive 3 votes. Due to technical difficulties, the Host's original vote will seem unchanged, but it's only visual, their vote will still get swapped.
SwapDead: You cannot swap votes after you've died.
SwapVote: The votes received by {0} and {1} were swapped!
SwapHelp: Use /sw [ID] to choose a player to swap votes with.
SwapNull: No alive player with that ID
SecurityGuardInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Security Guard, you can vent/pet to activate your ability, which prevents everyone from calling any sabotages and closing doors while your ability is active. This affects the doors sabotage and neutrals as well.
ChangelingInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Changeling, you can vent/pet to cycle between the available impostor roles. You can see the currently selected role below your name. Select the role you want to play as, then shapeshift to confirm your choice. Your role will be changed to the role you selected.
CL.EnabledSS: 启用化形人作为职业基底
CanPickPartnerRole: Can Pick Roles that Already Exist in the Game
CanKillBeforeRoleChange: Can Kill Before Picking a Role
AvailableRoles: Available Impostor-Teamed Role List to Choose From
DoormasterInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Door Master, you can vent/pet to open all closed doors.
RicochetInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Ricochet, you may vote someone in a meeting to make them your target. In the next round, your target will not be able to kill you.
SpyInfo: You know who interacts with you
SpyInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Spy, when someone uses their kill button on you (any ability that is used through the kill button), you'll see their name in orange for a few seconds.

Note: If a Crewmate used their ability on you, you'll also see them with an orange name!
Note: If you have no ability uses left, you won't see orange names at all!
SilencerInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Silencer, when you shift into a target you will blackmail that player, and the blackmailed player cannot speak.

Speaking by the blackmailed player will trigger the confusion command, please do not speak when the blackmailed player sees his icon.
SilencerShutUp: Shush! You'll die if you keep talking.
SilencerMax: Maximum times blackmailed players may speak
DoppelgangerInfo: Steal The Identify of Your Target
DoppelgangerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Doppelganger, use your kill button to steal a player's identity (their name and skin) and then kill your target.

Kill everyone to win.

Note:- You can not steal the identity of the target when Camouflage is active.
TetherInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Tether, you may vote someone in a meeting to make them your target. In the next round, you can vent/pet to teleport to them anytime.\nYour targets reset every meeting.
AidInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Aid, you may use your kill button on someone to protect them from direct attacks temporarily. Neither you nor your target will know if someone tried to kill your target.
MinTasksToActivateAbility: Minimum Number of Tasks Completed to Activate Ability
GuessManagerRoleInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Guess Manager, you know the roles of guessed players, and if someone misguesses, you'll see that.
BenefactorInfo: Mark Tasks as a Source of a Shield
BenefactorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Benefactor, you may complete a task to mark it. When someone completes a marked task, they will gain a temporary shield.
BenefactorTargetGotShieldNotify: You got a temporary shield as the task\nyou completed was marked by the Benefactor!
TaskMarkPerRound: Maximum Number of Tasks Marked Each Round
ShifterInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Shifter, you must steal someone's role by using your kill button near them. Depending on the settings, you may also steal their progress in their role and ability uses.\nIf you have this role when the game ends, you lose!
TremorInfo: When Doom Happens, Everyone is Doomed
TremorInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Tremor, you see a timer below your name indicating when doom happens. When you kill, the timer decreases. If doom happens, you kill everyone that comes near you, and you have a specified amount of time to kill everyone, otherwise you suicide.
Tremor.DoomTime: Doom Time (= Time to Kill Everyone)
Tremor.DoomNotify: Doom started! The Tremor now kills everyone that comes near them!
RogueInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs the Rogue, you get an objective with a reward each round. You can optionally complete the objective to get the reward.
Rogue.Reward.DisableDevices: Disable all devices for the rest of the game
Rogue.Reward.Morph: Ability to turn into a random crewmate (by sab/pet) for 15s
Rogue.Reward.IncreasedSpeed: Increased speed by 0.5x for the rest of the game
Rogue.Reward.Sabotage: Ability to sabotage for the rest of the game
Rogue.Reward.Shield: Invincibility for the rest of the game
Rogue.Reward.LongReach: Longest kill range for the rest of the game
Rogue.Reward.ImpostorVision: Impostor vision for the rest of the game
JournalistInfoLong: (Crewmates): As the Journalist, you can write down notes. When you die, all players will see your notes in the next meeting. Command: /note {add/remove/clear/view} [value] - add: Add a note specified in [value] - remove: Remove a note. Provide the index of it in [value] or leave [value] blank to remove the last note. You can see the indexes of your notes by using /note view - clear: Clear all notes (leave [value] blank) - view: View all notes and their indexes (leave [value] blank) Example uses: /note add I think blue and yellow are Lovers /note remove 2 /note clear /note view
JournalistError.ArgumentOutOfRange: The index you provided is out of range. Use /note view to see the indexes of your notes.
GrapplerInfo: Prevent kills and pull players towards you
GrapplerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Grappler, you can prevent 1 kill in each round if you have an ability use left at the end of the last round. The first kill attempt will be blocked and the target will be teleported to you and not die. Your ability doesn't work during sabotages.
ModeDescribe.FFA: 于众生自由玩法之内,众人只需释放本性,血流千里,角逐取胜!\n\n需要注意,天时地利也同样是重中之重.
FFA_DisableVentingWhenTwoPlayersAlive: Prevent venting when only 2 players are alive
FFA_EnableRandomTwists: Enable Random Swaps from time to time
FFA-Event-GetIncreasedSpeed: You have a temporary speed boost!
FFA-Event-GetLowKCD: You got a lower kill cooldown!
FFA-Event-GetHighKCD: You got a higher kill cooldown
FFA-Event-GetTP: You got teleported to a random vent!
FFA-NoVentingBecauseTwoPlayers: There are only 2 players alive, stop hiding in vents!
FFA-NoVentingBecauseKCDIsUP: Your kill cooldown is up, don't hide in vents!
FFA_DisableVentingWhenKCDIsUp: Prevent players whose kill cooldown is up from venting
FFA_TargetIsShielded: <color=#ffff00>The player you tried to kill is shielded!</color>
FFA_ShieldBroken: <color=#ffff00>Someone tried to kill you, your shield is now broken!</color>
ModeDescribe.MoveAndStop:
在漫步与驻足游戏模式中,每个人都有3个计时器,每个计时器旁边都有一个符号,代表你可以移动的方向.例如:
←（左）17s
→（右）5s
●（上下）9s

每个符号都是红色或绿色的.当符号旁边的计时器达到0时,颜色会切换并且与符号颜色同步.

注意:
你不能在某个方向的指示灯为红色时仍然往那个方向移动,否则你会死.
每个人都是船员,谁最先完成所有任务谁就赢了.
MoveAndStop_Tutorial:
<size=80%><#ffffff><size=100%>Stop on red lights</size>
Only move in directions where you see a green arrow
● indicates up and down
The timers indicate when the color changes
Yellow means the light will turn red, so stop moving
Orange means the light will turn green, but do not move yet
Finish your tasks to win</color></size>
ModeDescribe.HotPotato: 于烫手山芋玩法之内,一玩家出生随赠一个烫手山芋,即为灾厄,贴近他人可转移灾祸.若过了些许时间,仍然拿着烫手山芋的玩家就会爆炸而死,苟活即胜利!\n\n注意:你不能把烫手山芋传给上一个传给你的玩家(玩家人数>2的时候适用)
HotPotato_HolderSpeed: 持有烫手山芋的玩家的移动速度
HotPotato_HoldingNotify: <#ffff00><size=2>你拿到了烫手山芋，尽快传出去！</size></color>
PotatoInfo: 好烫！好烫！感觉要爆炸了！
PotatoInfoLong: 好烫！好烫！感觉要爆炸了！
ModeDescribe.Speedrun:
于争分夺秒玩法之内,速度即为一切,众生需尽快完成任务,与时间赛跑,之后就是疯狂的大屠杀!

只要有一个人率先完成所有任务,他就会变为杀手,屠杀就在所难免,苟活即是胜利!

但造化弄人,不论是做任务/屠杀都有时限,如果倒计时结束你还是无动于衷那么你就死了,如果你做了,那么倒计时会重置,所以要尽快哦!
Speedrun_TaskFinishWins: 第一个完成任务的人立即获胜（跳过屠杀环节）
Speedrun_TimeStacksUp: 将剩下的时间一并算入下一次时限当中
Speedrun_TimeLimit: 完成任务或杀人的时限
Speedrun_KillersCanKillTaskingPlayers: Killing Players Can Kill Players Who Didn't Finish Their Tasks Yet
Speedrun_CanKillSuffixInfo:
<#00ffa5>剩余时间：</color><#ffffff>{3}s</color>
<size=80%><#ffff00>目前存活玩家：<#ffab1b>{0}</color>/{1}</color>
<#ff1919>杀死所有人获得胜利</color>
<size=70%><#888888>除了你之外,有<#ffffff>{2}</color>个玩家可以进行击杀</color></size></size>
Speedrun_DoTasksSuffixInfo:
<#00ffa5>剩余时间：</color> <#ffffff>{4}s</color>
<size=70%><#888888>目前存活玩家：<#ffffff>{1}</color>/{2}</color>
<size=80%><#ffff00>剩余任务：{0}</color>
<#00ffa5>完成你的任务！</color>
<size=70%><#ffab1b><#ffffff>{3}</color>个玩家可以进行击杀</color></size></size></size>
RunnerInfo: COMPLETE TASKS AND KILL EVERYONE FIRST TO WIN
RunnerInfoLong: COMPLETE TASKS AND KILL EVERYONE FIRST TO WIN
ModeDescribe.CaptureTheFlag:
于夺旗玩法之内,分黄蓝两队,在两队的出生点内就有双方的旗子,你的目标是偷家敌人,偷走旗子,带回自己队伍即可,哪队率先做到即为胜利.

你只需要在旗子附近摸宠物/变形即可夺走敌对旗子.

若对敌队的人使用击杀可以把他们送回出生点/彻底杀死他们(取决于设置)

你还可以让拿旗子的人不能杀人(同样取决于设置).
CTF_AlertTeamMembersOfFlagTaken: 在队伍旗子被偷走时警告队伍内的成员
CTF_AlertTeamMembersOfEnemyFlagTaken: 在敌队旗子被偷时提示队伍内的成员
CTF_ArrowToOwnFlagCarrier: 指向我方持旗手的箭头
CTF_WhenFlagCarrierGetsTagged: 当拿着旗子的人被击杀时，旗帜会
CTF_EnemyFlagTaken: 你的队伍偷走了敌人的旗子！
CTF_PlayerStats: <#00ffa5>总共持有旗子的时间：<#ffffff>{0}秒</color>-总击杀数：<#ffffff>{1}</color></color>
ModeDescribe.NaturalDisasters:
于抗天命玩法之内,众生命中必有一劫.若无法躲过则万劫不复,天劫发生在随机的地图房间之中!<size=80%>

天劫及其影响:</size><size=70%>
天崩地裂:地面晃动,难以移动.
流星:流星从天而降,杀死一定范围内的玩家.
火山喷发:熔岩流出,融化肉体.
龙卷风:玩家被卷入龙卷风中,遂迷失于混沌.
雷暴:雷电击中玩家致其死亡.
沙尘暴:沙子吹来,遮挡视野.
海啸:一股巨浪袭来,淹死巨浪路线上的玩家.
地陷:地面坍塌,杀死一定范围以及以后进入此范围内的内的玩家.
建筑物倒塌:建物倒塌,里面的所有人都会死.之后无法进入倒塌了的房间.</size>
ND_LimitMaximumDisastersAtOnce: Limit Maximum Active Disasters at Once
ND_Earthquake.Speed: 船员在天崩地裂区域附近的速度
ND_VolcanoEruption.FlowStepDelay: 岩浆流动所需的延迟时间
ND_VolcanoEruption.DurationAfterFlowComp: 岩浆流动完毕后的存在持续时间
ND_SandStorm.Vision: 玩家在沙尘暴范围中的视野
OngoingThunderstorm: <#ffff44>⚠ 警告！周围存在雷暴！请注意你的人身安全！ ⚠</color>
ModeDescribe.RoomRush:
于抢椅子玩法之内,每个人需要抢到椅子,椅子所在的房间在游戏内会有提示,只要到达指定的房间视为抢到了椅子,但是最后一个到达指定房间的玩家死亡,苟活即是胜利!
BUT!如果倒计时结束还没有到达指定房间,不管几个都会死!
为了增加点乐子,前两个玩家到达指定的房间之后倒计时会骤然缩短!所以尽快!
依据设置,玩家还可以使用管道哦!
RR_GlobalTimeMultiplier: 全局时间大小（用来增加难度）
RR_TimeWhenTwoPlayersEntersRoom: 当前两名抢到椅子时，时间调整为
RR_DisplayRoomName: 在你的名字下方显示你需要去到的房间
RR_DisplayArrowToRoom: 显示指向需要到达的房间的箭头
RR_Tutorial_1: <#ffab1b><size=80%>教程</size></color>：\n你好！新玩家！欢迎来到抢椅子模式！\n
RR_Tutorial_2: 你所要做的就是尽快到达你名字底下指定的房间，抢到椅子！
RR_Tutorial_3: 当前两名抢到了椅子，时间会快速缩短
RR_Tutorial_4: 如果你是最后一名或者没有及时到达房间抢到椅子，你就会死。\n祝你好运！
RRPlayerInfo: 尽快到房间去，抢到椅子！
RRPlayerInfoLong: 尽快到房间去，抢到椅子！
ModeDescribe.HideAndSeek:
在躲猫猫游戏模式中,抓捕者必须杀死所有躲藏者,而躲藏者则必须在不被杀死的情况下完成所有任务才可以获胜.
如果倒计时为0,躲藏者也可以获胜.

另外我们还额外加入了一些特别职业丰富玩法,快来看看吧!
HNS.DangerMeter: 显示自定义的抓捕者报警器
TimeDecreaseOnShortTaskComplete: When Completing a Short Task, Reduce the Game Time by
TimeDecreaseOnCommonTaskComplete: When Completing a Common Task, Reduce the Game Time by
TimeDecreaseOnLongTaskComplete: When Completing a Long Task, Reduce the Game Time by
FoxInfo: Survive until the end to win
FoxInfoLong: Survive until the end to win
DetectorFrequency: 出现抓捕者位置信息的间隔时间
JetInfo: 使用宠物，提升速度，躲避抓捕者
JetInfoLong: 使用宠物，提升速度，躲避抓捕者
DasherInfo: 使用宠物，增加速度，赶上躲藏者
DasherInfoLong: 使用宠物，增加速度，赶上躲藏者
DasherSpeed: 疾行者的初始速度大小
LocatorDuration: 指南针的箭头持续时间
LocatorTargetKnows: 躲藏者是否可以知道他们被定位
VenterVision: 邪恶的工程师的视野大小
VenterSpeed: 邪恶的工程师的速度大小
AgentInfo: 你是躲藏者那里的卧底
AgentInfoLong: 你是躲藏者那里的卧底
PlayerAlreadyMod: This player is already a moderator, nothing was changed.
PlayerAddedToModList: Player successfully added to the moderator list.
PlayerRemovedFromModList: Player successfully removed from the moderator list.
PlayerNotMod: This player is not a moderator, nothing was changed.
PlayerAlreadyVIP: This player is already a VIP, nothing was changed.
PlayerAddedToVIPList: Player successfully added to the VIP list.
PlayerRemovedFromVIPList: Player successfully removed from the VIP list.
PlayerNotVIP: This player is not a VIP, nothing was changed.
GooseInfo: Honk at players to annoy them
GooseInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Goose, you can honk at players to annoy them. You can drag them around and make them unable to use their abilities while you're honking at them.
SimonInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs Simon, you can give instructions to players (Simon Says). Single click on someone to mark them, double click to kill to kill them. Vent to give out an instruction to all marked players. Players with kill buttons will be told to kill, while crewmates will be told to complete a task. If they don't follow the instruction until the next meeting, they will die. You can sabotage/pet to swap the instruction. This means, those who can, will be told to NOT kill, while crewmates will be told to NOT complete a task.
SimonKill: Simon says: <#ffff00>You must use your kill button before the next meeting</color>
SimonTask: Simon says: <#ffff00>You must complete a task before the next meeting</color>
SimonDontKill: Simon says: <#ffff00>You must NOT use your kill button until the next meeting</color>
SimonDontTask: Simon says: <#ffff00>You must NOT complete a task until the next meeting</color>
CatcherInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Catcher, you can place traps by venting/petting. When a player steps on a trap, their role will be recorded. In the next meeting, you'll get a message of the list of roles caught in your trap.<size=80%>

Note: You don't know who stepped on your trap and who has which role.
You can place multiple traps, and you'll get a message of all roles caught in all traps.</size>
Catcher.TrapPlaceDelay: Trap Placement Delay (after venting) (if not using pets)
Catcher.MinPlayersTrappedToShowInfo: Minimum Number of Players Trapped to Show Info
Catcher.NotEnoughCaughtRoles: Not enough players have stepped on your traps to show the roles.
GeneratorInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Generator, you generate charges every second. You can only kill/vent/shapeshift/sabotage if you have enough charges to do so. You also lose charges while shapeshifted.
Generator.ChargesLostWhileShiftedPerSeco: Charges Lost While Shifted Per Second
Generator.Notify.RevertShapeshift: You ran out of charges, so shapeshifting was reverted
Generator.Notify.NotEnoughCharges: You don't have enough charges ({0}) to do that
GNoCommandInfo: This Command can only be used when in lobby or after you die. type /gno X to play guess a number. X can be a number between 0 and 99 (both included). You get maximum of 7 tries to guess the number. Example:- /gno 10
GNoLost: Oh, you were so close! Just one more guess, and you might have deciphered the Da Vinci code! By the way, <color=#ff0000>the secret number was... {0}!</color> But hey, you were only off by a few billion possibilities.  Better luck next time, Sherlock!
GNoLow: Oh, you're really nailing this! It's so low, I almost need a shovel to dig it up!\nYou have <color=#ff0000>{0} guesses</color> left!
GNoHigh: Oh, absolutely! You're getting warmer. In fact, it's so high, I need a telescope to see it from here! \nYou have <color=#ff0000>{0} guesses</color> left!
GNoWon: Oh, how did you ever figure that out? It's almost like you're a mind reader! Congratulations, you're a genius! You found the secret number with <color=#00ff00>{0} guesses</color> left!
BanditInfoLong:
(Neutral):
As the Bandit, use your kill button to steal a player's Addon. Depending on the settings, you may instantly steal the addon or after the meeting starts. After the max number of steals are reached you will be able to kill normally. Additionaly, if there are no stealable addons present on the target, you will the target.

Kill everyone to win.

Note: Cleansed and Last Impostor can not be stolen.
NegotiatorInfoLong: (Crewmates): As the Negotiator, you can negotiate with someone by voting for them in a meeting. Your target then has to choose between suiciding, receiving a harmful add-on, permanently getting low vision or low speed. If they don't pick, the default action is suicide. They can use /neg {index} to pick. You can only negotiate once per meeting. After the meeting, you'll know what your target picked.
Negotiator.MinVotingTimeLeftToNegotiate: Minimum Voting Time Left to Negotiate
Negotiator.TargetMessage: The Negotiator forced you to pick one of the following options (use /neg {index}, replacing {index} with the number shown before the option you want, e.g. /neg 1), or you die:\n
Negotiator.Title: <#ffff00>⚠ Negotiator ⚠</color>
CommanderInfoLong: (Impostors): As the Commander, you can switch between 6 modes by venting/petting. You can execute the selected action by shapeshifting. Mark: Marks your shapeshift target with a unique color visible to all impostors. Use this to command them to kill that player! Whistle: This tells all or 1 specific* impostor(s) to come to you and gives them (each) an arrow pointing towards you. Kill Anyone: Notifies all or 1 specific* impostor(s) to kill anyone. Leave Player Alive: Shapeshifting into a crewmate marks that player with a unique color and text telling other impostors to not kill that player. Shapeshifting into an impostor tells that impostor to not kill anyone. Don't Sabotage: Notifies all impostors to not call any sabotage. Use Ability: Notifies all or 1 specific* impostor(s) to use their ability. * If you shapeshift into an impostor, the action executes specifically and only on them.
CommanderNotify: The Commander wants you to meet with them
CommanderKillAnyoneNotify: Commander wants you to kill anyone
CommanderDontSabotageNotify: Commander wants you to not sabotage
CommanderUseAbilityNotify: Commander wants you to use your ability
CommanderDontKillAnyoneNotify: Commander wants you to not kill
CommanderDontKillMarkMode: Mark a Player to Leave Alive
CanOnlyUseWhileAnyWatch: Can Only Use Ability When There is a Device Usage Alert
AAWarning: <#ffff00>You must move away from this device or you die!</color>
WizardInfoLong: (Crewmates): As the Wizard, you have 3 stats you can change for each player: Speed, Vision, and Kill Cooldown. Pet to cycle between these stats. Press Unshift to increase the value of the stat. To give the selected stat with its value to a player, use your kill button on them. Think twice before applying an effect, as it is permanent! You can override it by applying the same effect on them with a different value, but that removes another ability use!
Wizard.MinSpeedValue: Minimum Speed that can be given to players
Wizard.MinVisionValue: Minimum Vision that can be given to players
Wizard.MinKCDValue: Minimum Kill Cooldown that can be given to players
Wizard.MaxSpeedValue: Maximum Speed that can be given to players
Wizard.MaxVisionValue: Maximum Vision that can be given to players
Wizard.MaxKCDValue: Maximum Kill Cooldown that can be given to players
OxymanInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Oxyman, you have an Oxygen level below your name. The Oxygen level decreases overtime. You have to vent to increase your Oxygen. If the Oxygen level reaches 0%, you die. If it's very low, you're blind. If it's low, you're slower. If it's high, you're faster. If it's very high, you're invulnerable.
Oxyman.IncrementByVenting: On Venting, Oxygen Level Increases by
Oxyman.DecreasementEachSecond: Every Second, Oxygen Level Decreases by
BeehiveInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Beehive, you can sting players by single clicking your kill button on them. Stung players will have a certain time to walk a certain distance (get away from your bees) (distance set by the host), or they die.
Double click on someone with your kill button to kill them normally.
Kill everyone to win.
Beehive.StungPlayersDieOnMeeting: Stung Players Die on Meeting Start
Beehive.Notify: <#ffff00>You were stung by the Beehive!\nWalk {0} units away from the Beehive in {1}s or you die!</color>
SpurtInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen you start walking, you gain an enormous speed boost, which swiftly deteriorates, until you have to rest still for a while to rejuvenate your speed.
PhysicistInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nGrants portable vitals access for crewmate Roles.
FinderInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nGrants access to tracking players for crewmate roles.
NoisyInfo: 每个人都会知道你何时何地去世
NoisyInfoLong: (符文):\n与广播员具有的能力相同.
ClairvoyantInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Clairvoyant, you can see the remaining impostor and neutral killer counts by entering a vent or petting.
SafeguardInfo: You Get a Temporary Shield by Completing Tasks
SafeguardInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Safeguard, you get a temporary shield with each task you complete.
TelekineticInfo: Execute Different Actions to Help the Crew
TelekineticInfoLong: (Crewmates): Sees a timer at all times. Dies if it gets above 60s. They can vent to change modes. They can only have one mode activated at a time. To execute an action, pet. Frozen for 5s after using some powers, timer is 40s after a meeting. Each action increases the timer by a certain amount when used (indicated next to the action name in the following list in brackets) Modes: Teleport Target: teleports the nearest player outside the map (+40s) Teleport Self: teleports themself outside the map (+30s) Freeze: freezes the nearest player (+35s) Kill: instantly kills the nearest player (+60s) Shield: gives them a shield lasting for some time (+45s) Speed: gives them increased speed for some time (+30s) Doors: opens all closed doors instantly (+35s)
NonplusInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Nonplus, you can blind others by venting or petting. Blinded players can't see anything for a set amount of time.\nKill everyone to win.
RookieInfo: You Can't Kill on the First Round
RookieInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou can't kill on the first round.
TraineeInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou can't vent, sabotage, shapeshift, or pet on the first round.
TraineeNotify: <#ffff00>As the <#4287f5>Trainee</color>, you can't vent, sabotage, shapeshift, or pet on the first round!</color>
SoothsayerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Soothsayer, you can predict who kills you. If you're correct, when you die, everyone will be notified of the killer's identity.
SoothsayerDiedNotify: The Soothsayer predicted that {0} would kill them\nand they were correct!
VentriloquistInfo: Make Others Say What You Want
VentriloquistInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Ventriloquist, you can make others say what you want. First, type /target {id} to target a player. Then, type /chat {message} to make the targeted player say the message.
AugmenterInfo: Choose Who You Want to Kill
AugmenterInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Augmenter, you can shapeshift into someone to make them your target. The next time you attempt to kill someone, they will be swapped with your target and you will kill your target instead.
AugmenterFail: <#ffff44>Your attempt of murdering your target failed,\nso you've murdered your original target instead.</color>
InquirerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Inquirer, you can check if a player has a specific role by typing /check {player id} {role}. There's a fail chance.
Inquirer.MessageTrue: <#00ff00>Correct! That player has the role you entered.
Inquirer.MessageFalse: <#ff0000>Incorrect! That player does not have the role you entered.
FreezerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Freezer, you can shapeshift into a player to freeze them. The frozen player cannot move for a set amount of time.
PredatorInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Predator, you must kill one player that has one of the roles listed below your name. If you succeed to do so, you'll win with the winning team at the end. If you kill someone who doesn't have one of the roles listed below your name, you'll die.
NumOfRolesToKill: Amount of Roles to Choose From
MaxImpRolePicks: Maximum Number of Impostor Roles to Choose From
PredatorDone: You've done your job.\nYou'll win with the winning team at the end.
MarkseekerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Markseeker, your first vote will mark the voting target as your target. When you die, the role of your target will be revealed to everyone.
TigerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Tiger, you can sabotage/pet to become enraged. If you kill while you're enraged, the next closest player (within a radius) to your kill also dies.
RouleteGrandeurInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Roulette Grandeur, you can play Russian Roulette to reduce your kill cooldown after the next kill you make. Vent to cycle between the amount of risk (bullets) you put in. There are 5 slots. If you land on a bullet, you die. If you survive, your kill cooldown is permanately reduced by a set amount multiplied by the risk (bullets) you put in! Sabotage or pet to play a round with the chosen risk factor.
KCDReduction: Kill Cooldown Reduction (multiplied by the amount of bullets put in)
TankInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Tank, you must vent in every vent on the map. If you succeed to do so before the end of the game, you win with the winning team at the end. Otherwise, you lose. Your speed is significantly lower than others'.
GuessTank: According to the host's settings, the Tank cannot be guessed.
Tank.Suffix: <size=80%><#00ffa5>A random vent you haven't entered yet:</color> {0}</size>
RG.Hit: <#ffff00>The hit landed on one of your bullets!\nBetter luck next time!</color>
RG.NoHit: <#00ffa5>You survived, despite putting in <#8cffff>{0}</color> bullets.\nYour kill cooldown was reduced by <#8cffff>{1}s</color>!</color>
AgitaterInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Agitator, your premise is essentially Hot Potato.

Use your kill button on a player to pass the bomb.
This can only be done once per round.

The player who receives the bomb will be notified when receiving said bomb, in which they need to pass it to another player by getting near a player.

When a meeting is called, the player with the bomb dies.

If trying to pass to Pestilence or a Veteran on alert, the bombed player dies instead.
Optionally, the Agitator cannot receive the bomb.
AgitaterTargetNotify: YOU HAVE THE BOMB!! Pass it to someone else
CleanserRemovedRole: {0} has been cleansed. All their Addons will be removed after the meeting.
LostAddonByCleanser: All your Addons were removed by the cleanser
CleanserInfo: Erase All Addons of your vote target
CleanserInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nCleanser can vote for any target at the meeting to erase the target's Add-ons, and the erasure will take effect after the meeting ends. Depending on the settings cleansed player may never get add on in future
CleansedInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nCleansed Add-on can only be obtained if cleanser erases all your Add-ons. Depending on the cleanser settings, you may not be able to obtain any more Add-ons in the future.
UnderdogMaximumPlayersNeededToKill: 缩短击杀CD所需的最大存活玩家数
UnderdogKillCooldownWithMorePlayersAlive: 当大于这个存活玩家数目的时候，击杀CD大小
UnluckyTaskSuicideChance: Chance to suicide from doing tasks
UnluckyReportSuicideChance: Chance to suicide from reporting bodies
UnluckySabotageSuicideChance: Chance to suicide from opening a door
DiseasedCDReset: Cooldown returns to normal after a meeting
AntidoteCDReset: Cooldown returns to normal after a meeting
NukeRadius: 打击半径（ 12x已经是大出天界了）
MinionInfoLong: (Impostor Ghost):\nAs the Minion, you can protect someone (optimally a crewmate) to blind them for a few seconds.
WardenInfoLong: (Crewmate Ghost):\nAs the Warden, you can protect someone (optimally a crewmate) to notify them about being in danger and to give them a temporary speed boost.
WardenNotify: The Warden warns you that you're in danger!
SpecterInfo: 勤劳的人，终会迎来自己的曙光！
SpecterInfoLong: (Neutral Ghost):\nAs the Phantasm, you must finish all of your tasks to win! Depending on a setting, you may also end the game and win alone if you do so!
SnatchWin: Snatches Win (Win With Winning Team if Off)
BloodmoonInfoLong: (Impostor Ghost):\nAs the Bloodmoon, you can use your protect button on someone to make them die after a set amount of seconds. They know about this.
GAInfoLong: (Crewmate Ghost):\nAs the Guardian Angel, you can protect someone to save them from being killed. This is the vanilla Guardian Angel role, but as an add-on.
HaunterInfoLong: (Neutral Ghost):\nAs the Haunter, when you complete all of your tasks, a random living impostor's name will show in red to everyone in meetings. When you have 1 task left, all impostors will get an arrow pointing towards you, and if any of them come close to you, you lose this role.
Haunter1TaskLeft: <#ffff00>噩梦快要完成任务了！\n快靠近他，让他的职业被抹！否则就可能是你死了！</color>
HaunterFinishedTasks: 噩梦完成了所有任务，一个内鬼被揭示了！(很幸运不是你)
HaunterStopped: <#00ff00>噩梦的邪恶计划成功被阻止了！</color>
HaunterStoppedSelf: <#ff1313>一个内鬼贴近了你，你失去了你的职业！</color>
Haunter.TasksBeforeBeingKnown: 当噩梦完成多少任务时揭示噩梦的存在
Haunter.NumberOfReveals: 完成任务时揭示的玩家数量
RememberedNeutralKiller: You remembered you were a neutral killer!
RememberedMaverick: You remembered you were a Maverick!
RememberedPursuer: You remembered you were a Pursuer!
RememberedTotocalcio: You remembered you were a Follower!
RememberedAmnesiac: You failed to remember your role.
RememberedImpostor: You remembered you were an Impostor!
RememberedCrewmate: You remembered you were a Crewmate!
RememberedLover: You remembered you were a Lover!
IncompatibleNeutralMode: If neutral is incompatible, turn into
ImmuneToAttacksWhenTasksDone: Immune to attacks on task completion
AbyssbringerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Abyssbringer, you can place black holes. Black holes will suck in players and kill them when colliding with them.
Abyssbringer.Suffix: <size=80%><#00ffa5>Number of players consumed by</color> {0} <#00ffa5>active black holes:</color></size><size=70%>\n{1}
BlackHoleMovesTowardsNearestPlayer: Black Hole Moves Towards Nearest Player
SleepInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou sleep during lights out. You can't see anything, and you cannot move. You can only wake up when the lights are back on. If someone with the Glow add-on comes near you, you fully wake up and lose this add-on.
LyncherInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Lyncher, each X tasks you complete (X is set by the host), you get to know one more letter from everyone's roles. You can see these characters below players' names. The letters are not in order and each letter only appears once for every occurance in the role name. Settings determine whether you can guess.
Lyncher.TaskNum: Number of Tasks to Complete for Each Letter
ParityCheckTargetKnow: Targets know they were checked by <color=#0D57AF>Inspector</color>
ParityCheckOtherTargetKnow: Targets know who they were checked with
ParityCopDead: You can not use your power after death
ParityCheckMax: Max inspections per game reached!\nYou can not use your power anymore.
ParityCheckRound: Max inspections per round reached!\nYou can check again in the next round.
ParityCheckSelf: HA!! you thought it would be this easy. You can not check yourself
ParityCheckReveal: HA! you thought it would be this easy. You can not check a role that is revealed
ParityCheckTrue: {0} and {1} are in the same team!"
ParityCheckFalse: {0} and {1} are NOT in the same team!
ParityCheckHelp:
Instructions: /cp [Player ID 1] [Player ID 2] 
Example: /cp 1 5 
You can see the player IDs before everyone's names 
 or use the /id command to list the player IDs
ParityCheckNull: Please select an ID of a living player to check their team
ParityCheckBaitCountMode: <color=#00f7ff>Bait</color> count as revealing role if <color=#00f7ff>Bait</color> reveal on first meeting is on
ParityCheckRevealTarget: When tasks done, target knows team of other target
ParityCopTargetReveal: Looks like {0} is aligned with team {1}
CopyCatMiscopyLimit: 造成自杀所需的最大复制失败次数
CopyCatAlreadyCopy: 你已经在此回合中复制了一个职业
CopyCatCanNotCopy: 无法复制该目标的职业
CopyCatCanKill: 效颦者在复制失败后可以触发击杀
CopyCrewVar: Can copy evil variants of crew roles
TasklessCrewCanBeLazy: 没有任务的<color=#8cffff>船员职业</color>也可以拥有<color=#A4DFFE>懒惰</color>符文
TaskBasedCrewCanBeLazy: 任务型<color=#8cffff>船员职业</color>也可以拥有<color=#A4DFFE>懒惰</color>符文
CouncillorDead: 抱歉，你不能在死后滥用职权
CouncillorMurderMax: 抱歉，你的次数达到上限，无法再滥用职权
LaughToWhoMurderSelf: Hahaha, who would've thought someone was stupid enough to murder themselves?\n\nGuess it happens to be... YOU!
MisguessButNoSuicide: You guessed incorrectly so you.... WOULD have died if the host wasn't kind enough to disable guesser suicides!
MurderHelp: Command: /tl [player ID]\nYou can see the players' IDs before the players' names.\nOr use /id to view the list of all player IDs.
MurderNull: Please choose a living player to murder.
CouncillorMurderMaxMeeting: 你不能在这次会议上谋杀更多的玩家，你已达到房主设置的限制。
DazzlerDazzleLimit: 受眩晕影响的最大玩家人数
DazzlerResetDazzledVisionOnDeath: 重置被眩晕玩家在眩晕者死亡/被驱逐时的视野
PresidentInfoLong: (Crewmates): As the President, you have 6 decrees each to be used once in the game. You can only use 1 decree in every meeting. To use a decree, type /decree {number}, replacing {number} with the ID of the corresponding decree. To get a list of decrees and their IDs, type /decree. List of decrees and what they do: - Revealing: Reveals you as the President for everyone, makes you unguessable and cuts your vision in half for the rest of the game. - Finishing: Ends the current meeting instantly without counting the votes. - Declassification: Everyone will see voting colors at the end of the current meeting. - Government Support: Gives all crewmates +1 ability use. - Investigation: Get info about how many impostors and neutral killers are alive. - Government Recruiting: After using, vote for someone to recruit them (your vote will be canceled and you'll be able to vote normally after this) to recruit that player to the role specified in the settings, if they're a crewmate.
President.Help: Command: /decree {decree ID}\nYou can see the decree IDs by typing /decree
President.Recruit.TargetNotifyMessage: You have been recruited by the <#30916f>President</color>!
President.DecreeAlreadyUsedMessage: You have already used this decree or it isn't enabled!
President.DecreeAlreadyChosenThisMeeting: You have already chosen a decree this meeting!
GuessErased: You cannot guess a player's role that has been erased.
AlchemistInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Alchemist, you create a potion by completing a task. The potion you made will show up under your role name with its corresponding description and instructions. You can get 7 different potions.
AlchemistVisionOnLightsOut: Vision During Lights Out During Sight Potion
AlchemistGotQFPotion:
<color=#ffffff><size=1.7><color=#e6d798>Potion Name: </color><color=#3333ff>Quick Fix Potion</color>
<color=#e6d798>Description: </color>You can fix the next critical sabotage alone
Activates <color=#e6d798>automatically</color></size></color>
AlchemistGotTPPotion:
<color=#ffffff><size=1.7><color=#e6d798>Potion Name: </color><color=#42d1ff>Teleport Potion</color>
<color=#e6d798>Description: </color>Teleports you to a random player
Activate by <color=#e6d798>Venting/Petting</color></size></color>
AlchemistGotSuicidePotion:
<color=#ffffff><size=1.7><color=#ffff00>Awkward Potion</color>
Looks like you've mixed the wrong ingredients!

DadInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the dad, your life depends on alcohol. When you get attacked or voted out, you survive, but your alcohol decreases. Alcohol also decreases slowly over time. To increase your alcohol level, you have to get money from completing tasks and go to a random selected vent to buy a beer. Beer increases your alcohol level. When you finish all your tasks, you get new tasks, but you don't have to do them for task win. You don't know how much alcohol you have at the time. You only see warning when your alcohol level is low. Alcohol is counted in ‰.

You also have some abilities that are unlocked if you have enough alcohol. To use ability, switch between them using pet button and use selected one by venting:
<size=60%>- Going for milk: You go for milk. When you use it, you get teleported outside the map. You also can't discuss or vote in meetings. You can do nothing. You will come back with milk after exactly 10 years. When you come back, crewmates instantly win. When you use it, everyone will be informed about it.
- Super vision: You will have max vision for some time.
- Sniffing: You get arrows pointing to existing dead bodies after using it. Arrows only update when you sniff again.
- Sleep: During sleep people can't interact with you, but you can't see or move. During sleep you also cannot use any abilities and your alcohol is stable. You wake up when a meeting starts.
- Rage: You kill next person you see.
- Giving drink: You give all nearby players a drink. Every of these players will say their role in meeting with a chance of an incorrect result.
- Becoming god of alcohol: Resets your alcohol to 1‰, but your alcohol will increase instead of decreasing from now on.</size>
<size=70%>Every ability (except going for milk) will reduce your alcohol after using it.
If your alcohol reaches 0‰, you die.
Also, you see which abilities you can use. It can give you some more information about your alcohol level.
To make this role balanced, when someone attacks you, you lose alcohol after some time and not instantly.</size>

UpReplacedMessage:
/up was replaced by /setrole which allows you to set anyone's role for any game by typing '/setrole (ID) (ROLE)'. You can view ID's with /id.
To set your own role like with /up, you need to do '/setrole 0 (ROLE)'.
